title: MUTSVENE MWARI SAMASIMBA
hymn:
1. Mtsvene, Mtsvene, Mtsvene!

Mwari samasimba!

Tinokuimbira pa mangwanani ese;

Mtsvene, Mtsvene, Mtsvene!

Mune ngoni huru.

Mwari vatatu, mumwechete zve.



2. Mtsvene, Mtsvene, Mtsvene!

Vatsvene vanodaro!

Vakapfugamira pamberi pako Mwari!

Mtsvene, Mtsvene, Mtsvene!

Vanokurumbidza,

Hamusanduki dakara rinhi.



3. Mtsvene, Mtsvene, Mtsvene!

Hatizokuwoni,

Zvakaipa zvedu zvavanza huso hwenyu!

Mtsvene, Mtsvene, Mtsvene!

Ndimi Mutsvene chete,

Makarurama makachena zve.



4. Mtsvene, Mtsvene, Mtsvene!

Zvose zvakasikwa

Zvinokudza imi, mukuru kune vese!

Mtsvene, Mtsvene, Mtsvene!

Wetsitsi nengoni!

Mwari musiki Baba wavese.

title: KUDZAI MAMBO
hymn:
Kudzai Mambo, anohutvsene;

Arikudenga, anamasimba:

Ndiye mwoyo yedu ya karekare,

Chigaro chake chakakurumbira.



Imbai masimba, ne ngoni dzake,

Arikudenga ne nguo chena;

Hasha dzake dzose dzinotinhira,

Anofamba zvake pachamupupuri,



Anamasimba , wakasika

Nyika ne zvinhu zvose zvirimo;

Wakaitsigira no murairo,

Wakaikombera nemvura yose.



Kufudza kwako kusingarebgwi;

Kuri pa mhepo na pa kupenya,

Kuri pa makomo na pa makanga,

Kuri pane mvura na pane dova.



Isu vaduku hatine simba,

Tinotarira chete kwauri;

Tsitsi dzako dzose dzisingapere,

Hama yakanaka no mununuri.



Unamasimba no rudo rwose;

Dzinoimbira dzose kudenga;

Nesuwo ve nyika tinoimbira,

Tinokurumbidza kusingapere.

title: IMI MOSE MURI PASI
hymn:
Imi mose muri pasi,

Imbai kuna Jehovah:

Kurumbidzai mumutende;

Huyai no rufaro kwaari.



Tinoziva kuti Jehovah

Ndiye Mwari we chokwadi;

Tiri dare re hwai dzake,

Anotipa kudya kwedu.



Pindai suwo guru rake;

Muswedere kuna Mambo;

Simudzai mazwi enyu,

Makafanira kudaro.



Ndiye Mwari wakanaka

Tsitsi dzake dzakakomba

Rudo ne chokwadi chake

Hachingatipinde isu.

title: MWARI URI ZUVA REDU
hymn:
1.Mwari, uri zuva redu,

Unopenya pa uzuru;

Asi mweya ungawone

Paunozo famba napo.



2. Mwari, uri nhowo yedu,

Hatidzitye hondo dzedu;

Dzose dzinokundwa newe,

Tigouya nokufara.


3.Unotipa ngoni dzako ,    

Unotipa no hutsvene,

Unopa vanonamata,

Unopa rukomborero.


4. Rukomborero rukuru

Rukomborero rwe denga,

Ruripo rwavanofunga,

Kuti vanodiswa newe.

title: TAURAI NESU ISHE WEDU
NGATIMUKUDZE MWARI
hymn:
Ngatimukudze Mwari

Ne Mwoyo inofara,

Tsitsi dzake ihuru

Dzinoitirwa isu.




Anoraira Zuva

Rivhenekere nyika

Tsitsi dzake ihuru

Dzinoitirwa isu.



Zvinhu zvose zvipenyu

Zvinoponeswa naye:

Tsitsi dzake ihuru

Dzinoitirwa isu.



Anotikwanisawo

Anoda kukumbirwa:

Tsitsi dzake ihuru

Dzinoitirwa isu.



Kana tiri panhamo

Tinochengetwa isu:

Tsitsi dzake ihuru

Dzinoitirwa isu.

	

Mwana wake wakafa

Kuti tipinde denga:

Tsitsi dzake ihuru

Dzinoitirwa isu.



Ngatimukudze Mwari

Ne moyo inofara:

Tsitsi dzake ihuru

Dzinoitirwa isu.

title: MUKUDZEYI IYE MWARI
hymn:
Mukudzei iye Mwari,

Na vari kudenga;

Mukudzei iye Mwari,

Navari pa Nyika.



Imi muri kokudenga,

Mukudzei iye Mwari,

Nemi muri hondo dzake,

Mukudzei iye.



Iwe, zuva, newe mwedzi,

Mukudzei iye;

Nemiwo imi nyenyedzi

Mukudzei iye.



Iwe moto, newe chando,

Mukudzei iye;

Iwe chando newe bute,

Mukudzei iye.



Ne Mhepo inovuvuta,

Chimukadza iye;

Newe ita izwi rake,

Pa unozonzwiwa.



Imi muri vashe mese,

Mukudzei iye;

Nemi imi vanhu mese,

Mukudzei iye.



Imi mese vakomana,

Mukudzei iye;

Nemi imi vasikana,

Mukudzei iye.



Nemi vanhu vachembera,

Mukudzei iye;

Nemi imi mhuri yose,

Mukudzei iye.

title: JEHOVAH UNAMASIMBA
hymn:
Jehova unamasimba,

Zvose zvakasikwa newe;

Uri Ishe wavo vose,

Ivo vari pakudenga.



Jehova unoruzivo,

Unoziva zvose zvinhu;

Isu vanhu hatizivi,

Isu tose hatigoni.

	

Jehova wakarurama,

Na iyo mirau yake;

Isu nyamba tapfuura

Tine mhosva mberi kwake.



Jehova uri Mutsvene,

Takaipa mberi kwake;

Isu ngatimukumbire

Rwose ruregero rwake.



Jehova unadzo ngoni,

Wotibata nadzo tose,

Wakauya Mwana wake

Kuponesa vanhu vose.

title: NGATITENDE KUNA JEHOVAH
hymn:
Ngatitende kuna Jehova,

Kuti wakanaka;

Kuti dzose ngoni dzake

Hadzinozopera.



Ngavadaro Israeri,

Dzimba dzavo dzose;

Kuti dzose ngoni dzake

Hadzinopera.



Ndakashevedza Jehova,

Ndanga ndamanikwa;

Wakazondoiisa iye,

Kunzvimbo yo’fadzo.

	

Kana Ishe wakandida,

Handigoni kutya;

Angamuka akadiiko

Mhunhu’yu kwandiri?



Izvo Ishe wakandida,

Anondiyamura;

Anondiyamura zvikuru,

Ku vavengi vangu.



Kuvimba naiye Ishe,

No kunzvenga naye;

Ndizvo zvakanakanaka,

Kusavimba’ vanhu.



Ngandipone newe Ishe,

Undiropafadze;

Ndizorore newe Ishe,

Undiropafadze.

title: WAKASIKA ZVOSE ZVINHU
hymn:
Wakasika zvose zvinhu,

Iwe Mwari wega,

Pasina wakuyamura,

Kuzviita kwako.



 Aya Makomo amire,

Akasikwa newe;

Akamira akasimba,

Nokutsigwa newe

	 

Nayo mvura ya tinonwa,

Takapihwa newe;

Naiko kudya kwatinodya,

Takapihwa newe.



Wakasika vanhu iwe,

No kufana newe;

Ukavapa zvinhu zvose,

Zvakakodzera.



Kwasvika muvengi wavo,

Akavabvutira;

Vaakusiya iwe Mwari.

Vakanzw’izwi rake.



Wakati kuvaponesa,

Ukaita tsitsi;

Ukavapa Mwana wako,

Akazovafira.

title: NDINOSHAMISWA KWAZVO
hymn:
Ndinoshamiswa kwazvo

Na mabasa makuru

Akaitiwa newe

Ose anorumbidza;

Hukuru hwako Mwari,

Hinoshamisa kwazvo.

	

Kana ndarangarira

Mabasa O kudenga;

Kana ndarangarira

Mabasa e pa nyika;

Inobuda misodzi

Kana ndafunga iwe.



Mwari vatatu mumwe

Ita kuti tikude,

Nokuti wakatida,

Wakazotipa Jesu,

Watipa Mweya wako

Wokutipupurira.



Rumbidza iwe denga!

Rumbidza iwe nyika!

Rumbidza iwe gungwa!

Nesu ngatirumbidze!

Uyo musiki wedu,

Unorudo rukuru.

title: ZADZISA CHAIREVO CHAKO
hymn:
Zadzisa chirevo chako,

Mwari Ishe wechokwadi;

Ose marudzi enyika

Ngaawane roponiso.

	 

Namabvi kuneyi nyika,

Ngaapfugame panewe;

Dzidzamare dzose ndimi

Dzireve hukuru hwako.



Tonga Tonga, Ishe Jesu!

Kuuye newe kufara,

Nezvikanganiso zvedu

Tatdzisa yose nyika.



Tarira nyika yokwedu,

Urege kuipa kwayo,

Urege kutsamwa kwako,

Isingafe mhuri yayo.



Ramba Ishe tisazvidze

Zvidzidziso zvezwi rako;

Ugozotimutsirira

Tinzwe nechokwadi chako.

title: BABA MUNESIMBA ROSE
hymn:
Baba mune samba rose,

Ndiyamure iwe;

Kana wandisiya iwe

Ini ndoendepi ko?

Korus

Ndinotenda, ndinotenda, Jesu wandifira,

Ndichaponeswa neropa rake rakakomba.

		 

Wakamutuma munyai,

Kureva kwatiri;

Wakatipa Muponisi

Kutifira isu.



O Jesu wakashongedzwa,

Une ngoni huru;

Nokuti wakaroverwa

Pa’mchinjikwa uyu.



Ndinodzokera kwauri,

Unetsitsi iwe;

Zvino ndigamuchire ini

Usipo ndingafe.

title: HUYAI VAKRISTU
hymn:
Huyai BaKristu,

Nokufara no kukunda:

Huyai, huyai ku Betrehem;

Huyai, muwone

Ishe wengirosi;

Huyai, ngatimutende, kristu Ishe



 Mawri wa Mwari

Kuchen ko kuchena

Wazvarwa m'komana wa Mariya;

Mwari chokwadi

Mwari pakutanga;

Huyai, ngatimutende, Kristu Ishe

	

Ombai, ngirosi,

Ombayi nokufara,

Ombyi vanhu vose kudenga,

Tendai kuna Mwari,

Mwari wokudenga:

Huyai, ngatimutende Kristu Ishe.



Tinomukwazisa,

Wazvarwa iri zuva;

Ngakupihwe Kristu kutenda:

Izwi ra Baba,

Huyai, ngatimutende, Kristu Ishe.

title: FARAI VATENDI MANGWANANI ANO
hymn:
Farai vatendi mangwananiano,

Muponisi wavanhu wazvarwa;

Chikudzai rudo rwakakomba,

Rwe ngirosi zhinji dzinoruimba:

Shoko radzakauya naro

Kuti Mwari waponwa nenyama.



Vafudzi vakambotaurirwa,

Vakanzwa izwi rengirosi huru,

Ndina mashoko akakomba

Kune vanhu vose pane nyika:

Dama ra Mwari rakadzika,

Jesu waponwa ndiye muponisi.

	 

Ikadaro Ngirosi, pakarepo

Dzikaimbirana rwiyo rutsva;

Dzikakudza rudo rwaMwari,

Denga rikatinhira nokuimba;

Rukudzo rwa Mwari dzikaimba,

Tsitsi dzasvika pano panyika.



Vafudzi vakambomhanya kwazvo,

Kundoona zvavakaitirwa;

Vakadzokera ku hwai dzavo,

Vachiri kukurumbidza Mwari,

Vakaparidza zvavakaona,

Vanayayi vokutanga va Mwari.



Ngatirangarire tichifunga

Urwo rudo rukuru rwa Mwari;

Titarise Mwana Mutsvene,

Achienda kuno muchinjikwa;

Nengoni dzake timutevere

Tidzamare tisvike kudenga.



Kuti tisangane ne ngirosi

Taponeswa tichifara kwazvo;

Ndiye waponwa nezuva rino

Anozotionesa hupenyu;

Takaponeswa no rudo rwake

Tinokudza Mambo woKudenga.

title: HOSANA WEKUDENGA
hymn:
Hosana wo kudenga,

Ndoimba nezwi rangu,

Ku mwana wa Davida

Wauya kwandiri.

Hosana, ndiyamure

Pakurema kwangu:

Wauya asadanwa

Muponisi wangu.



Ndoshonge dzakadini

Azondishanyira?

Mugadzirire iwe

Moyo wako wose.

Ndoupira kwauri

Mununuri wangu,

Upfugame kwa uri

Chokwadi’Ishe wangu.



Ndasunungurwa newe

Mu Torongo rangu:

Rikadimurwa newe

Iro joti rangu:

Rakandirasikisa

Ndasiya hupenyu,

Wakandifarisa zve

Pakuchema kwangu.

title: RUMBIDZAI VANHU MOSE
hymn:
Rumbidzai vanhu mose!

Zvirumbidze zvinhu zvose!

Nhasi musi wokukudza

Nhasi musi worufaro.



Mununuri wakazvarwa,

Rufadzo rwakauyiswa,

Nhasi tsitsi dzakauya,

Nhasi kupona kwauya.



Ha’nokuuya se hondo,

Fambisai hedzi nhau,

Kuti nedzo tsitsi dzake

Wauya kuzotifira.



Fambisai hedzi nhau

Dziende pa nyika yose,

Tendai ka, vanhu mose!

Ne zvinhu zvose zvitende!

title: MUNUNURI WEDU
hymn:
Mununuri wedu

Wasvika kwatiri:

Moyo yedo yose

Ifare kakare,

Mununuri wasvika zve!

Munuri tamunzwa zve!

	 

Tose ngatifare

Pa uso wakewo,

Tidzokere kwaari

No kudana kwake.

Mununuri wasvika zve!

Munuri tamunzwa zve!



Tinodiwa naye

Muripiri wedu:

Naye ngatifare

Nemimwoyo yedu.

Mununuri wasvika zve!

Munuri tamunzwa zve!



Anotirevera

Tsitsi dzose:

Anodanidzira

Mune denga rake.

Mununuri wasvika zve!

Munuri tamunzwa zve!

title: INZWAI HERI INZWI
hymn:
Inzwai heri izwi

Rinobva kumakore:

Kwasvika ngirosi

Dzichibvako kudenga.



Inzwai dzinoimba

Dzinoimba na Mambo

Dzinomukudza kwazvo

Dzinoreva nhau dzake.

	 

Ndi.Jesu uyo Mambo,

Dzinoparidza zvake,

Iye achangozvarwa

Ikoko Betrehema.



Farai zve vatadzi,

Mumukurumbidze zve,

Namatai kwaari,

Anoda isu tose,

title: KRISTU EMANUERI
hymn:
Kristu emanueri

Ndi Mwari no mhunu!

Tinomutenda uyu musi

Wokuuya kwako.



Unotifungisa

Nokupfava kwako:

Uno munhu sowa Mwari,

Ukabo muranda.



Uko kuita kwako

Wakuitire isu

Tigoti nebasa rako

Tiwonewo nzira.



Tanga tarasika

Nokuipa kwedu,

Wakauya kutidzora

Kune chakaipa.

	

Wati uri nzira,

Iyo yechikwadi,

Vose vanofamba nayo

Vachawana ngoni.



Zvino toti Jesu

Tikukurumbidze,

Tinoimba tichifara

Nokuuya kwako.

title: FARAI NESU TINOTENDA
hymn:
Farai nesu tinotenda,

Tapihwa rufadziso:

Zvatinoti kana tafunga,

Tiwone zvishamiso!



Jesu waburuka kudenga,

Rwauya ruponiso;

Tinoda izwi ro hupenyu,

Inzwai zvoshamisa



Wafira vakaipa vose,

Wabvisa zvidariko;

Watakura nemhosva dzedu,

Kakare zvoshamisa!



Mukati pane rima redu,

Wakativenekera;

Waperisa hupofu hose,

Honayi zvoshamisa.

	

Wakagumburwa pane nzira

Ne nzira yo kuyedzwa;

Angapihwe ruregerero,

Kakare zvoshamisa!

title: TARIRAI MUDZIWONE
hymn:
Tarirai mudziwone

Netsitsi dzakanyanyisa,

Dzakarehwa nomuponisi,

Wakafira isu vanhu.



Tanga tifamba pa rima,

Tisane chatiyedzera;

Tanga tifamba titadza,

Tisazivi kururama.



Watitusa Iwe, Mwari,

Ne tsitsi dzako ihuru;

Wakatipa Mwana wako,

Wakatiyedzera naye.



Tinotenda Iwe,Mwari,

Isu vanhu vakaipa;

Wakaripa kuipa kwedu,

Wakutakura ‘ye oga.



Iwe, Mweya wo hutsvene

Huya uve nesu tose,

Utituse, tikuwone

Apo pakaitwa newe.

title: URI MUPENYU MUPONISI
hymn:
Uri mpenyu muponisi,

Uri mpenyu iwe;

Tariswa isu vanhu,

Uri mpenyu iwe.



Wanga wafa Mponisi,

Wanga wafa iwe;

Wabairwa isu vanhu,

Wabaiwa iwe.



Wakakwira pa kudenga,

Wakakwira iwe;

Utiteurire isu,

Uteure iwe.



Unotonga Mponisi,

Utongere isu,

Taponeswa pakaipa,

Taponeswa isu.

title: WATAKURA KUIPA JESU
hymn:
Watakura kuipa Jesu,

Kusi kuipa kwako;

Ukaripa mhosva Jesu,

Isi mhosva yako.



Waivo munhu anetsitsi,

Usatadza iwe;

Raparara ropa rako,

Wakanaka iwe.

	 

Kudarika kwedu kose,

Kwakanyorwa newe;

Ne zvirandu zvedu zvose,

Zvakanyorwa newe.



Taregerwa taponeswa,

Ne zvirwadzo zvako;

Tinoshamba pakaipa,

Nero ropa rako.

title: TSITSI HEDZI DZAMIRA DZOGA
hymn:
Tsitsi hedzi dzamira dzoga,

Zvirwadzo zvakamira zvoga,

Ne ngoni dzakamira dzoga,

Pamuchinjikwa.



Ishe waburuka kudenga,

Akazova mhunhu kuvanhu,

Akave diramhamba redu,

Pamuchinjikwa



Rutendo rwedu rwo mirepi?

Kufunga kwedu kwomirepi?

No rudo rwedu rwomirepi?

Pamuchinjikwa



Tsaona ingaperi yose,

Ne mhaka dzose dzingaripwe;

Zvakaipa zvinoregerwa;

Pamuchinjikwa

 

Dzakaona ngirosi pasi,

Dzakatigwana mwana pasi,

Dzichiwona mashura ayo!

Pa muchinjikwa.

title: NGATIIMBE NENGIROZI
hymn:
Ngatiimbe nengirosi

Dziri mbri kwa’she;

Ndimi dzadzo dziri zhinji,

Faro rumwechete.



Rakafanara Gwayana

Dzinodaro idzo;

Kurigadzwe zvakadaro

Pauzuru pose.



Wakafanira mponisi

Kugamuchira zvose;

Rudo no kuropafadzwa

Ngakuve kwaari.



Zvinhu zvakasikwa naye

Zvomukurumbidza,

Pamwe namarudzi ose

Ari nyika dzose.

title: URI MWARI MUPONISI
hymn:
Uri Mwari Muponisi,

Wakaita zvose;

Uri Mwari Muponisi,

Wakakurumbira.

	 

Waive munhu Mponisi,

Nokuipa kwedu;

Waive munhu Mponisi,

Wakafira isu.



Unetsitsi Mponisi,

Na vari pamhosva;

Unetsitsi Mponisi,

Navari pakufa.



Wachimbidza Mponisi,

Kuzotipindura;

Wachimbidza Mponisi,

Kutisunungura.



Unesimba Mponisi

Rokutiponesa;

Unesimba Mponisi

Rokutifadzisa.



Unerudo Mponisi

Unetsitsi nesu;

Unerudo Mponisi

Ngatimude iye.

title: JESU WATIFIRA
hymn:
Jesu watifira,

Tisaazivi chinhu;

Wakatichengeta,

Takava marema.

	

Nyika inerima,

Tarasika tese,

Jesu watifira,

Tisazive chinhu.



Jesu Ishe wedu,

Hatitsvake mumwe;

Jesu M’sununguri,

Taponeswa newe.

Hakuchina ngozi,

Kana tava newe;

Jesu watifira,

Tisazive chinhu.

title: NGATITENDE KUNA JESU
CHANGAMIRE MUPONISI
hymn:
Changamire Mponisi!

Ishe wakambozvinzwa;

Ne zvirwadzo zvako Tenzi,

Kwakwaniswa kupona.

Changamire Mambo Jesu!

Mutakuri wemhosva;

Nako kufa kwakakomba

Takapihwa hupenyu.



Gwayana ra Mwari Baba,

Tonamata kwauri;

Ropa rakaparadzirwa

Isu vakarasika.

Vanhu vako vose, Ishe,

Vakatengerwa nzvimbo;

Vakazaruriwa m’suwo

We bako rekudenga.



Changamire! Wakagadzwa

Pa chigaro chitsvene,

Hondo dzose dzo kudenga

Dzinokukurumbidza.

Unoteurira isu,

Unotireverera;

Pa Musha wako mutsvene

Unoda kutipinza.

	

Wafanira kugamuchira

Rukudzo no hutsvene;

Kukurumbidza kukuru,

Rudo rusingapere.

Tiyamurei ngirosi,

Huya nenziyo dzenyu;

Tose tiimbire Mambo

Tine moyo muchena.

title: NGANDIITE MUNAMATO
hymn:
Nganditende munamato

Kuna Ishe wokupona;

Wandiitira rufaro,

Ndichifara Muponisi.



Ndandigere pakaipa,

Ndakabatwa namangava;

Ndandoenda kuno moto,

Ndiponese mununuri.



Wandinzwisa dama rako,

Wandidyisa tsitsi dzako,

Ndingazova Mwana wako,

Ndokutenda Muponisi.



Wandibvisa pane tsitsi,

Wandiisa pa hupenyu,

Ndorurama ‘ko kudenga

Nedzo tsitsi, muponisi.

title: N’ANGA HURU
hymn:
N’anga huru yava pedyo,

Une tsitsi ndi Jesu;

Anoda kutifarisa

Inzwa izwi ra Jesu.



Korus

Rwiyo rwakanakisa,

Zita rakanakisa,

Rumbo rwakanakisa,

Jesu, Ishe, Jesu.



Waregerwa zvakaipa,

Inzwa izwi ra Jesu:

Famba zvakanaka uko,

Uyende kuna Jesu.



Hutsvene huri kwaari,

Zvino ndotenda Jesu:ndinorida zita rake,

Zita ra Kristu Jesu.



Kutya kwangu kwaparadzwa,

Nero zita ra Jesu;

Mwoyo wangu unofara

Kunzwa zita ra Jesu.



Kana tichisvika uko,

Tisvike kuna Jesu;

Tichikurumbidza zita,

Zita ra Ishe Jesu.

title: MUKA MWEYA
hymn:
Muka, mweya wangu,

Rasa kutya kwako;

Diramhamba rako

Rinosvika zvino;

Muponisi wakanyora

Zita rangu nero ropa.



Agere kudenga,

Anditeurire,

No rudo nengoni,

Namaropa ake;

Ropa ratiparadzirwa,

Rirriko mberi kwa Mwari.



Maronda mashanu,

Iye wagamuchira;

Anditeurire,

Zvikuru nesimba:

“Mugere” achichema,



Bab anomunzwa

Mwana mudikanwa;

Haadi kuramba

Miteuro yake:

Mweya anonditaurira,

Kuti ndazvarwa na Mwari.

	 

Mwari warandutsa

Ndinzwe izwi rake,

Ndiri mwana wake,

Handitye pamoyo.

Ndinoswedera, ndichiti

“Mwari Baba, Mwari Baba”.

title: MUDIWO MWEYA WANGU
hymn:
Mudi wo Mweya wangu

Ndinotizira kwa’ri,

Mhepo inovuvuta,

Ndiri pachamupupuri:

Ndivanze Moponisi!

Pana madutu ose;

Nomusi wokupera

Gamchira Mweya wangu.



Handina gomo rimwe,

Ndokuchemera iwe;

Urege kundisiya,

Ndiyamure netsitsi.

Ndinotenda kwauri

Ndinoponeswa newe;

Fukidza msoro wangu

Na mapapiro ako.



Handidi chimwe chinhu,

Ndinoda iwe woga!

Unomutsa vawire,

Unorapa varwere.

	 

Iwe wakarurama,

Ndiri mutadzi kwazvo;

Ndizere zvakaipa

Iwe wakarurama.



Unengoni gzizhinji,

Dzo kukunda kuipa;

Zarura tsime rako,

Chenesa moyo wangu.

Tsime rakanakisa,

Ndinoda kunwa iro,

Bvira pa moyo wangu,

Gara kusingapere.

title: JESU TINOKUTENDA
hymn:
Jesu, tokutenda watifira,

Muponisi!

Kutadza kwedu kuregererwe

Muponisi!

Shambidza moyo yedu pa mhosva;

Tizadzise norufaro rwako.



Jesu wakunda muvengi wedu,

Mununuri!

Tisunungure pazvakaipa

Mununuri!

Kana tichiyenda, kumuteyi,

Tipe isu ruyamuro rwako.

	 

Jesu tidzidzise kuda kwako,

Mudzidzisi!

Kufunga kwedu kuri pa uri

Mudzidzisi!

Dama rako ngarive kuyedza,

Kuda kwako kuve murau wedu.



Jesu uchengete tsoka dzedu,

Muchengeti!

Tinogumburwa panzira yako.

Muchengeti!

Tidzivire isu pane tsviyo,

Titungamire kumusha wako.

title: TINE CHIPO CHAKAKOMBA
hymn:
Tinechipo chakakomba

Chatakapihwa iyesu;

Tachipihwa na Jehova,

Icho chipo chainacho.



Chakakomba ichi chipo,

Kwavari vakachiwana;

Vanochida kwazvo icho,

Pamsoro pezvinhu zvose.



Chinesimba icho chipo,

Kwavari vakachiwana;

Cho hupenyu icho chipo,

Kwavari vakagamchira.

	 

Icho chipo ndiye Jesu,

Cha takapihwa iyesu;

Uri chipo chakakomba,

Kwavari vanomutenda.



Tinomutenda Jehova,

Naicho chipo chikuru;

Tinom’tenda Mwari woga,

Nokutipa mwana wake.

title: KUDZA KUDZA
hymn:
Kudza, kudza, Jesu Muponisi wedu,

Imba nyika, reva rudo rwake;

Kudza, kudza, ngirosi dzo hutsvene

Zita rake ngarive nesimba:

So mufudzi Jesu unotifudza,

Na maoko anotitakura;

Kudza, kudza, reva no hukuru hwake,

Mukudze nenziyo dzakanaka.



Kudza, kudza, Jesu Muponisi wedu,

wakatifira zvakaipa zvedu;

Dombo redu, ruvimbo rwo ruponiso,

Kudza, kudza, Jesu wakatifira.

Jesu wakatitakurira nhamo,

Rudo rwake rwakakomba kwazvo;

Kudza, kudza, reva no hukuru hwake,

mukudze nenziyo dzakananka.

		 

Kudza, kudza, Jesu Muponisi wedu,

Pakudenga vanokurumbidza;

Ndiye Jesu anogoibvunza nyika,

Gadza Jesu, ave Mambo wako (wedu)

Acahauya kuzoikunda nyika,

Masimba ndeake nohutsvene;

Kudza, kudza, reva no hukuru hwake,

Mukudze nenziyo dzakanaka.

title: IRO ZITA RAJESU
hymn:
Iro zita ra Jesu,

Iguru rakakura;

Rinodiwa kudenga,

Rinotyiwa panyika:

Iguru kuvatendi,

Rokudzwa no kuimba.



Iro zita ra Jesu,

Ragamchirwa no m’tadzi,

Rodambura makashu

A satani okuipa;

Wakatenda kwariri

Wamutswa pano rufu.



Iro zita ra Jesu,

Ndokudza iro roga;

No musi wo ndoenda,

Ndoreva pakufa;

Nezita rake Jesu,

Ndigoenda kudenga.

title: MUFUDZI WAVANHU VOSE
hymn:
Mufudzi wa vanhu vose,

Rufaro rwo moyo wangu,

Ndoda kuwadzana kwako

Ndinoda kugara newe:

Ndotsvaka mafuro ako

Dopa vanodya vatendi,

Vachizorora kwa uri

Vasinga piswe ne zuva.



Iyo nzvimbo ndiratidze,

Pavanogara vatendi,

Pa vanomutarisisa,

Jesu wakavaroverwa;

Nditaurire rudo rwose,

Kurwadzwa kwako nokufa,

Ndiyende kuneyo nzvimbo,

Ndirobwe ndikunde newe.



Ipapo navanhu vako,

Ndinoda kugara newe,

Kurinda pasi padombo,

Zvimwe pachipfuva chako;

Ipapo ndiregerere,

Handidi kubva kwauri,

Ndichengete Mwari wangu

Pakati pomwoyo wako,

title: JESU URI NZIRA
hymn:
Jesu iwe urinzira,

Toyenda newe kudenga,

Unotitungamirira,

Tiponeswe pakipa.



Jesu, urizviro kwazvo,

Nao ose mazwi ako;

Namakuhwa akaipa

Mberi kwamaziso ako.



Uri Jesu wo hupenyu,

Tingapone newe tose;

Kunozodaro tapinda

Pakudenga tive newe.



Nzira kwazvo yo hupenu,

Tokutenda isu tose;

Nao yose moyo yedu

Tinotenda nguva dzose.

title: NDOMUKURUMBIDZA
hymn:
Ndomukurumbidza

Musununguri;

Unondiponesa

Pa zvakaipa:

Unondifarisa

Pamwoyo wangu;

Ngandikurumbidze

Musununguri.

	 

Ndandakabatika,

Pamhosva yangu;

Ndandakasvibiswa

Pa kuipa kwangu’:

In’ndakanga ndafa,

Pa mweya wangu:

Wakandiponesa

Musununguri.



Ndochigara naye

Musununguri;

Ndochifamba naye

Pa nzira yangu:

Woenda kudenga,

Ndoenda neni,

Ndova pahupenyu

No M’sununguri.

title: MUNUNURI NDINOMUDA
hymn:
Mununuri ndinomuda,

Kuti unondiponesa,

Ndinobiswa panorufu,

Ndinopinzwa pahupenyu.



Mununuri ndinomuda,

Kuti wandiregerera;

Wandiparadzira ropa,

Wakaripa mhosva yangu.

	

Munuri ndinomuda,

Kuti wakandishambidza;

Wandibisa zvakaipa,

Nezvitadzo zvangu zvose.



Mununuri ndinomuda,

Kuti wandivenekera;

Wabvisa hubofu kwose,

Wandiburutsira Mwenje.



Mununuri ndinomuda,

Unondiperekedzera;

Izwi rake ndiwo mwenje

Wokuchenga tsoka dzangu.



Mununuri ndinomuda,

Kuti unondiyamura;

Kana ndiri pakurwara,

Ndinosimbiswa pabasa.



Mununuri ndinomuda,

Kuti uri simba rangu;

Unondifadza pamwoyo,

Unokunda dzose hondo.



Mununuri ndiye Jesu,

Rakakomba zita rake:

Ngandikwanisiswe ini

Panerununuro rwake.

title: NDINOKUDA
hymn:
Jesu ndinokuda muponisi wangu,

Ndasiya zvose zvakaipa zvangu,

Iwe M’sununguri, iwe M’chengeti,

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndinokuda Jesu,

Ndinokuda jesu, ndokuda zvino.



Ndokuda nokuti Iwe wakandida,

Wakandiroverwa pamuchinjikwa,

Ndokuda nokuti wakandifira,

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndinokuda Jesu,

Ndinokuda jesu, ndokuda zvino.



Ndinogokuda ndichiri mupenyu,

Ndichakurumbidza mazuva ose,

No musi wokufa ndinogoimba,

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndinokuda Jesu,

Ndinokuda jesu, ndokuda zvino.



Kakare, kana ndiriko kudenga,

Ndichagara newe ndichakukudza,

Ndichaimba kwazvo, na vanhu vose,

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndinokuda Jesu,

Ndinokuda jesu, ndokuda zvino.

title: WAMUKA NHASI
hymn:
Kristu wamuka nhasi! wamuka kwazvo!

Kristu wamuka nhas!i wamuka kwazvo!

Watakura kwedu,

Wakapedza basa rake.

Wakakunda kufa, wakakunda kufa.

Hareruya! Hareruya! Hareruya! Ameni.



Kristu wamuka nhasi! wamuka kwazvo!

Kristu wamuka nhas!i wamuka kwazvo!

Ngavafare vanhu vose,

Ngavaimbe pamwechete,

Wamuka nhasi, wamuka nhasi.

Hareruya! Hareruya! Hareruya! Ameni.



Kristu wamuka nhasi! wamuka kwazvo!

Kristu wamuka nhas!i wamuka kwazvo!

Wakapedza basa guru,

Tose takwana tsitsi,

Hosana kwaari! Hosana kwaari!

Hareruya! Hareruya! Hareruya! Ameni



Kristu wamuka nhasi! wamuka kwazvo!

Kristu wamuka nhas!i wamuka kwazvo!

Ngavaimbe vanhu vose,

Ngavimbe norufaro,

Nziyo dzakanaka, nziyo dzkanaka

Hareruya! Hareruya! Hareruya! Ameni

title: IWE KRISTU WAMUKA
hymn:
Iwe Kristu wamuka,

Nezvo unomutsa vose,

Wakamuka nohupenyu

Vahwo vose vanotenda.



Nokuzvarwa pakaipa,

Ndandigere pakaipa,

Ndakamutswa ndaponeswa

Newe Jesu Muponesi.



Ndingatye chiiko ini,

Kana ndaenda paguva?

Kufa ndiyo nzira yangu,

Yokupinda pahupenyu.



Wakakwire pakudenga,

Kristu Jesu wo hupenyu,

Unonditungamirirako

Ndonozovako ndinewe

title: TINOFARA NHASI
hymn:
Tinofara nhasi,

Isu tinotenda,

Tirumbidze Ishe wedu

Nokumuka kwake.



Uchiri mupenyu,

Nyamba wakambofa;

Ndorupi rukundo guva

Nesimba rokufa?



Rose Basa rake,

Rose wakapedza;

Ruponiso waruwana,

Tingapone tose.

	 

Farai vatendi,

Hoyo, Mambo wenyu!

Ngakuberekwe mapudzi

Okutenda kwenyu.



Ikoko kudenga,

Vanokusuwai,

Nokuti iye wamuka

Newe ungamuke.



Onodiiko iwe,

Wakaipa wafa?

Chinhu chatarirwa iwe

Icho chokumuka.



Rasa nharo dzako

Huya, tenda iye,

Dombochimuka pakufa,

Unokuponesa.

title: MUSI WESABATA
hymn:
Musi we Sabata,

Musi wakakura,

Wakbuda pane guva

Ishe wokudenga.



Kwakakundwa kufa,

Ratorerwa Guva,

Wakamuka muponesi:

Revai mashoko.

	 

Farai vatendi,

Imbai ngirosi,

Wakakoneswa satana,

Wakagara ishe.



Honayi vatsvene!

Iro guva ra’She

Rigere roga, wamuka

Wakenda Ishe.

title: UNOTIYI NHASI KUFA
hymn:
Unitii nhasi kufa,

Newe gara guru?

Makurirwa mose suzwe

Naye wokudenga.

Wafa Jesu kamwechete,

Waenda paguva:

Wakamukazvake iye,

Waenda kudenga.



Mutendei imi vanhu!

Nhasi wakakunda,

Watogara pahupenyu

Iye wanga afa.

Mutendeiwo, ngirosi!

Ikoko kudenga,

Basa wakaripedzisa

Rake panenyika.



Ava naye namasimba,

Nohumambo hwose,

Unotendwa makomborero

E ngirosi dzose.

Isu vatadzi tapona

Pamhosva dzeduwo,

Atikwidze tive naye

Napakufa kwedu.

title: WAKAMUKA ISHE JESU
hymn:
Wakamuka Ishe Jesu,

Wakabuda pane nguva,

Wakamuka nohumambo,

Wakamuka panorufu.



Jesu wohupenyu hwose

Hauno kunzwa kuwora,

Uchagara nohupenyu

Unofara nokufara.



Jesu tinokurumbidza,

Nako kufa wakambofa;

Dzose hondo wadzikunda,

Nero zuva wakamuka.



Jesu zvirokwazvo zvako

Zvinowonekwa zvokwadi;

Waita vatendi vako

Vave vazhinji zvikuru.

	 

Vagoti vomusi wako

Unozova mutsa nawo;

Vave parutivi rwako

Vachinzwa rufaro ivo.

title: NDINOBVA KWAMURI
hymn:
Ndinobva kwamuri, ndinoenda kudenga,

Ndinoenda kuimba ya baba;

Kuneiyi imba inohutsvene ‘kuru,

Ndinokugadzirirai nzvimbo.



Kana ndichienda, ndokudzokerai,

A’vanhu venyika vaone;

Kana ndichidzoka ndikugamchirei,Tigare panzvimbo ndinemi.



Iri’zwi ra Mambo, ririizwi rorufadzo

Farai vatendi, farai!

Ishe wakenda, asi achdzoka,

Apinze kudenga imi mose.



Ipapo togara pa hutsvene kwazvo,

Navazhinji zhinji chokwadi;

Ne redu iri izwi tiri pana vamwe,

Tokudza Ishe wekudenga,

title: IMI MAGONI EMWOYO
hymn:
Imi magonhi emwoyo

Zarukai mukudzike

Uyu Mambo wo hutvene

Unoda kuti apinde.



Uyu Mambo wo Hutsvene!

Reva, ndiyaniko iye?

Uyu Mambo wohutsvene!

Ndiye Jesu uyu Mambo.



Unengoni kwazvo kwazvo,

Unesimba rose iye;

Nokubva kwako kose,

Angakuitire iye.

title: MWEYA MUTSVENE WAMWARI
hymn:
Mweya Mutsvene wa Mwari!

Gara muno mumba,

Buruka zvino nesimba,

Huya, Mweya, Huya!

	

Huya, Mweya, kufanana

Kupenya kwezuva;

Venekera mwoyo yedu,

Wonesa kuipa.



Wonesa rushava shava,

Nezvirwere zvose;

Titungamire panzira,

Panoenda va tsvene.

		

Huya serimi romoto,

Pisa mwoyo yedu,

Tichive zviteuriro

Kuna Ishe wedu.



Huya Mweya kufanana

Dova rokudenga,

Mwoyo isingabereki

Ive namapudzi.



Huya seNjiva yedenga,

Utivumbamire

Namapapiro erudo,

Noruregerero.



Huya sedutu remhepo,

Netsitsi nengoni,

Kuti vanhu vakuwone,

Nokupenya kwako.



Mweya Mutsvene waMwari!

Tarasika isu;

Buruka zvino nesimba,

Huya, Mweya, Huya!

title: TINOTENDA JESU
hymn:
Tinotenda Jesu,

Izwi rako iro,

Iro wakavimbisa

Kuvadzidzi vako.

	 

Unozoti Baba,

Pane zita rako,

Achibata mufadzisi

Pakuenda kwake.



Kuimbira Jesu

Kuripo kwatiri;

Nagrikwanisiswe zvino,

Tifadziswe naro.



Svika ruregero

Pane mwoyo yedu;

Chibvisa kuipa kose,

Bvisa ne zvo kutya.



Huya mufadzisi,

Unesimba rako;

Tishambidze utizadze

Nohutsvene hwako.

title: MWEYA WOHUTSVENE
hymn:
Simudza kufunga kwedu

Mweya wohutsvene;

Tifunge mabasa ako,

Tidzidzise nawo.



Iro zuva rokuuya,

Ngarisvike zvino;

Kuti iwo moto wako

Usvike kwatiri.

	 

Tambanudza ndimi dzedu,

Dzidzidziswe newe;

Pisa nayo mwoyo yedu

Tizviteurire.



Kusangana kwamashoko,

Takakumiririra;

Huya Mweya wohutsvene,

Ita basa pano.



Huya nesimba zvikuru,

Zadza iyi nzvimbo;

Tigonzwa masimba ako

No kuita kwako.



Chikurumidza kuuya,

Mweya wohutsvene;

Chinzwa miteuro yedu,

Utiburikire.

title: MWARI NEDZO TSITSI DZAKO
ISHE BABA TAKARINZWA
hymn:
Ishe Baba takarinzwa

Iro dama rakakomba;

Zvirokwazvo rakanaka,

Asi isu tiri matsi.



Tanga tigere parima,

Nezvo zvokuzvarwa kwedu;

Tatigere pakaipa,

Ne makore edu ose.



Ukagotiwana iwe,

Ukatipa izwi rako;

Tinorinzwisisa iro,

Rinotiisa panzira.

	

Tinoziva nezvo titende,

Tichiteeerera zvikuru;

Iro rinotiveneka,

Kuti ritiropafadze.

title: HERO DAMA ROKUDENGA
hymn:
Hero dama rokudenga

Ro musiki wedu;

Ngatirinzwise zvikuru

Nayo mwoyo yedu.

	

Rinoreva nguva dzose

Nokuipa kwedu;

Rinovekera isu

Zvohurema hwedu.



Zvakaipa zviri hondo

Inoparadzisa;

Asi iro ndiro shoko,

Rokutiponesa.



Ndiko kuti ngatidzoke

Pakuipa kwedu;

Tizvirasire kwaari,

Muponisi wedu.



Ngatibatirire iye

No kusimba kose;

Tinoponeswa na iye

Pane zvakaipa.

	



Hero iri zuva rake

Ro kutiponisa;

Wamira nengoni dzake

Kuti atifadze.



Ngatimuke tigamchire

Iri dama rake;

Unozotiropafadza

No ‘poniso rwake.

title: TINE DAMA RAKO MWARI
hymn:
Tine dama rako Mwari,

Nehupenyu naro;

Tinoziva zvakaipa,

Muponisi wedu.



Rakafamba iro dama,

Richafamba iro;

Ose marudzi avanhu,

Amirira iro.



Dzinokundwa hondo dzose,

Neri dama Ishe:

Ichazara nyika yose,

Neri dama Ishe.



Dzose nzizi dzapa nyika,

Dzichafara naro;

Na vanhu vose venyika,

Vopfumiswa naro.

	

Dzichapera hondo dzose,

Nezwi rako Mwari;

Kuchauya kuwadzana,

Nezwi rako Mwari.

title: DZIDZISAI VADZIDZISI
hymn:
Dzidzisai vadzidzisi,

Imi vanhu vake!

Mudzidzise izwi rake,

Kudzu dzose nyika.



Asi ngoro yezwi rako

Ngaifambe iyo;

Kudzu dzose nzvimbo Jesu,

Ngaifambe iyo.



Vadzidzisi dzidzisai,

Imi vanhu vake!

Ngarinzwiwe dama rake,

Navo vose vanhu.



Asi dama rako Ishe,

Ngarisvike muno;

Ngarikwane nyika yose,

Kudzu dzose nzvimbo.



Asi nyika dziri kure,

Ngadzizive idzo;

Dzitarire kuna Jesu,

Dzichitenda iye.

title: TADAIDZIRWA HUTSVENE
hymn:
Tadaidzirwa hutsvene,

Isu vanhu tese;

Paridzai dama rake,

Pane nyika yose.

	

Kwanzi ngatibude tese,

Pane vakaipa;

Kwanza, ngatirege zvose,

Zvo kupenga kwedu.



Kupenga kwapano pasi,

Kwakatinyengedza;

Icho che chokwadi hechi,

Charurama kare.



Hedzi ngoni noruregero,

Nedzo ko kudenga;

Urwu rudo no rufaro,

Ndo rwapa hupenyu.

title: JESU ANOGUGUDZA
hymn:
Gugu, gugu, ndiyani,

Anogugudza kwazvo?

Ndiye mweni ndishe wako

Wazoshanya kwauri

Ndimashura nawo rudo

Muzarurire m’suo.



Inzwai, inzwai uripo!

Wagugudza nesimb a!

Kana gonhi richiramba,

Ari kurwir’ kupinda;

Uchimira ndimashura

Muzarurire gonhi.



Kana ukanonoka,

Uchiripo nazvino.

Hona ropa namaronda!

Wakabairwa iwe:

Nadiye Jesu Muponisi,

Muzarurire gonhi.

title: KUNA MWARI ZVITAURE
hymn:
Kuna Mwari zvitaure,

Ne tsitsi dzako dzose,

Uchimuudzaq iye,

Zvinokumanikidza.



Anozviziva ga,

Kuwanda kwazvo zvose;

Anozviziva ega

Nerudzi rwazvo zvose.



Haati azvidz’ani,

Unoreva kawaari;

Haati atand’ani,

Unouya kwaari.

	

Unochema misodzi

Anokuwona iye;

Kana uchitambura,

Anozokuknunura.



MuKristu unochema,

Chiudza Mununuri;

Wanga wati panyika

Akachema misodzi.



Unonyaradzwa naye,

Pane nhamburo dzako

Unopihwa masimba

Pane zvirwadzo zvako.

title: RIRIPO TSIME RIZERE
hymn:
Riripo tsime rizere,

Neropa ra Jesu:

Vatadzi vakashambwa’mo,

Vakachena kwazvo.



	Korus

Ndinotenda, ndinofara,

Jesu wandifira;

Na pa muchunjikwa ropa,

Randaparadzirwa.



Uyo m’pati wakafara,

Kuwona tsime’ro;

Neni mutadzi mukuru,

Ndinotenda kwazvo.

	

Iwe Gwayana ra Mwari,

Ropa rine samba;

Kutisunungura isu,

Panezvakaipa.



Handifanire kupinda,

Kudenga kutsvene;

Asi iwe wakaripa,

Mhosva dzangu dzose;



Ndachaimba nero shoko,

Nguva dzangu dzose;

Nokudenga ndichafara,

No kusingapere.

title: PAIMBA YEGWAYANA RAMWARI
hymn:
Pa imba yeGwayana ra Mwari,

Ichiripo nzvimbo yo kupenya,

Pindai, pindai, nzvimbo ichiripo.



Kuripo kufara no kuimba,

Ruripo rudo rwose ne ngoni,

Pindai, pindai, nzvimbo ichiripo.



Tinodaidzwa naye Muridzi,

Anoda kuti vose vapinde.

Pindai, pindai, nzvimbo ichiripo.



Wapera musi ravira zuva,

Kwaiva nemimvuri mirefu.

Pindai, pindai, nzvimbo ichiripo.

	 

Imba yesvitsa yoda kuzara,

Uchakazarurirwa Mukwasha.

Pindai, pindai, nzvimbo ichiripo.



Chenjera kwazarurirwa gonhi,

Kana zvichinzi, “Nzvimbo haipo”

“Haipo, haipo, inzvimbo haipo”.

title: ISHE NDINZWE NOKUFARA
hymn:
Ishe! ndinzwe nokufara,

Ndinzwe ne tsitsi dzako,

Dzaunopa vanhu vose,

Ngadziuye pandiri, Pa ndiri.



Rega kundisiya, Baba,

Kana ndiri mutadzi,

Ndinokuipa pa moyo,

Asi huya pa ndiri, Pa ndiri.



Huya pano, Muponisi!

Ngandichengetwe newe;

Kana uchindishovedza

Ndichauya kwauri, kwauri.



Mweya Mutsvene wa Mwari!

Rega kundipfuura,

Ngandiwone, ndiri bofu,

Taura izwi re samba, Resimba.



Rudo rwako Mwari Baba,

Ropa ra Ishe wangu,

Nokuwadzana kwo Mweya,

Kungavepo kwa ndiri, kwa ndiri.

title: NDINOCHEMA MBERIKWAKO
BABA NDITARISE NETSITSI
hymn:
Baba nditarise ne tsitsi dzako,

Ndiregere dzose mhosva dzangu;

Ne ropa re Mwanakomana wako,

Ndomboriteerera izwi rangu.

	



Ishe wangu, ndinayo tsvina bedzi,

Handingashambidze mwoyo wangu;

Zvino ndofunga tsitsi dzako bedzi,

Nekuti ihuru mhosva yangu.



Zvose zvakaipa zvandakaita,

Zviripo zvino pameso angu;

Kwandinyadza kose koita kwangu,

Ndaremerwa nedzo mhosva dzangu.



Asindanzwa ruregero rwako,

Nero ropa romuponisi wangu;

Neni ndinganzwe kubvuma kwako,

Ndave mukudaidzwa naShe wangu.

title: NDINOCHEMA PAMWOYO
hymn:
Ndinochema pamwoyo,

Ndinochema kwauri,

Ndinoda kuponeswa

Naropa rako Jesu,

Ndinoda kudzokera

Kwauri Ishe wangu.



Ndinochema kudzinzwa

Tsitsi pamwoyo wangu.

Dzokunditungamira.

Pakudzokera kwangu.

Ndifambe nayo nzira,

Igume pakufara.

	

Ndinochema kutenda,

Nesimba rangu rese;

Panewe muafiri wangu

Ndigare ndinofunga

Ndiwe mufiri wangu,

Wandiripira mhosva.



Ndinochema masimba

Anobva kuna Ishe;

Ndinoramba zvenyika,

Ndichienda kudenga.

Ndimutse Mwari wangu,

Ndibude pakipa.

title: KWETE IDZO TSITSI DZAKE
hymn:
Kwete! Idzo tsitsi dzake

Naivoo vari pamhosva

Vaunoda vaponeswe

Anovada van’hupenyu.

	

Mwanakomana wa Mwari

Chiteerera vamarombe,

Uponese nohupenyu

Vatyori vemirau yako.



Idzo tsitsi dzako Jesu

Dzakakwana nyika yose:

Hadzinga yenzaniswe,

Hadzipere pamwechete.

	

Magororo namakorwa,

Vapambi navano vemba,

Vose vahovedzwa newe

Kuti vose vaponeswe.



Zvavachema vateerere,

Zvavabvuma varegere,

Simbisa rutendo rwavo,

Vateterere chokwadi.

title: RAKANAKA IRO ZUVA
hymn:
Ndinochema Ishe Mwari!

Baba uri Mtsvene ‘ndinzwe;

Handino kufara Mambo,

Ndiponese Ishe wangu.



Ndiri hwai, ndarasika;

Nganditsvakwe Ishe wangu;

Ndiri pasi pamapako,

Chindironda Ishe wangu.



Ndakarasa nzira yako,

Ndikarega tsitsi dzako,

Ndikakwira pamikwidza,

Ndikanyura pakaipa.



Pane rima rakakomba,

Buda, zuva rakanaka!

Ngandi pinde pane nzira

Ndiponese, Ishe, Jesu.

title: JESU NDANGA NDAKURASA
hymn:
Jesu ndanga ndakurasa,

Asi iwe wanga wandifira,

Asi nhasi ndinonyara,

Pamhidza undigamuchire.



Handine kufanir’ini,

Kuitirwa idzo tsitsi,

Zvino ndinoita seyiko?

Pamhidza undigamuchire.



Ndinokuipa kukuru,

Nhasi kwandi manikidza;

Ndakatarisa kudenga,

Pamhidza undigamuchire.



Zvose zvandange ndaita,

Zvaipa ndinozvinyara;

Ishe wangu nechokwadi,

Pamhidza undigamuchire.



Ishe, Jesu, ndinochema,

Zvino ndiri pasi pako;

Ndinochemera mhosva yangu,

Pamhidza undigamuchire.

title: HUYA MUMWOYO WANGU
hymn:
Huya mumwoyo wangu,

Huya kuna’she wandu,

Huya nhasi pakaipa,

Uchaenda pane rufu,

Huya mu mwoyo wangu.

	

Chema mu mwoyo wangu

Ne zvakaipa zvangu;

Zvakaipa zvinonyadza,

Asi ini ndichiinazvo,

Chema mu mwoyo wangu.



Teura mu mwoyo wangu

Huya kuMununuri;

Daidza iwe kuna’she

Unonzwa iye kudenga

Teura mu mwoyo wangu.



Imba mu mwoyo wangu

Tenda kuna’she wangu;

Wakambouya panyika,

Kuti ndiende kudenga;

imbaamu mwoyo wangu.



Fara mu mwoyo wangu

Ku Mununuri wangu,

Wakauya kundifira,

Zvino wakandiponesa,

Fara mu mwoyo wangu.

title: MWARI NDIRI MUROMBO
hymn:
Mwari ndiri murombo,

Ndiri murombo wako,

Mwari ndiri nherera ,

Ndiri nherera yako,

Ne zvakaipa zvangu

Zvandiita nherera.



Iwe Mwari Mutsvene,

Nestitsi dzako Baba,

Wandipa mwana wako

Kuti azondifira,

Kuti andiponese

Na ropa rake roga.



Iwe Mwana waMwari

Chindiponesa ini,

Ku zvakaipa zvangu,

Ndinoremerwa kwazvo,

Ndiwe musununguri

Ngandi nunurwe newe.



Iwe Mwanakomana

Wa Mwari Baba wangu,

Ndiwe wakandifira

Pa muchinjikwa wako,

Wakawoneswa nhamo

Kuti kupone ini.

	

Mwari ndinomutenda,

Jesu ndinomutenda,

Newe Mweya Mutvene,

Muri vatatu mumwe,

Ngandirumbidze kwazvo

Kusingapere Baba.

title: BABA NDIRI MWANA WAKO
hymn:
Baba ndiri mwana wako,

Kana dnakatadza;

Ndinochema mberi kwako,

Baba ndiregere.

	

Zvitadzo zvangu zvizhinji,

Hazvinga verengwe;

Ndinozviisa kwauri,

Baba ndiregere.



Mirau yako ndakatyora,

Iwe ndakuzvidza;

Munuri ndamurasa,

Baba ndiregere.



Ndakatadza no kureva,

Ndakatadza Ndatadza kufunga;na mabasa,

Baba ndiregere.

	 

Kana ndanga ndafanira,

Nokukurumbidza;

Ndatadza nokukanganwa,

Baba ndiregere.



Nezvakaipa zvizhinji,

Baba ndakatadza;

Ndakakunyadzisa iwe,

Baba ndiregere.



Uri Mwari unengoni,

Dzisino kupera;

Naizvozvo ndinochema,

Baba ndiregere.

title: KWAENDEPI ISHE JESU
hymn:
Kwaendepi Ishe Jesu

Kufariswa kwangu?

Iko kwandaiva nako,

Pakutanga kwangu.



Kufadziswa kwakadaro,

Pano mwoyo wangu;

Nyamba zvino kwakaenda

Kufadziswa kwangu.



Iko kurasika Jesu,

Kwakandinyadzisa;

Pamhidza kundigamuchira,

Zvino ndinopfidza.

	

Newe Mweya wohutsvene,

Pamhidza kuuya

Ndinovenga zvakaipa

Zvakandiparadza.



Ndiyamure Ishe wangu,

Ndizvirase izvo;

Vadzimu vakandirasa,

Ndarasika navo.



Ndive nokufamba newe,

Pakuchena kwako;

Kuti ndikwanise yose,

Mirau yako.

title: RAKANAKA IRO ZUVA
hymn:
Rakanaka iro zuva,

Randakatenda kuna She!

Mwoyo wangu, fara zvako,

Udza vanhu vose iro.



Korus

Ranaka, ranaka, ra Jesu wakandishamba!

Iye wakandidzidzisa kurinda nokuteura

Ranaka, ranaka, ra Jesu wakandishamba!



Chanaka chitenderano,

Chinondisunga kuna’she!

Ngaizadzwe imba yake

Ne rwiyo rwandinoimba.

	 

Rakapera! basa guru;

Ndiri wake, uri wangu:

Wakandizvuva nerudo

Ndikamutevera ini.



Mwoyo wangu! chizorora!

Wakatsaukaniswa kare:

Rega kubva kuna Ishe,

Kwa’ari zvose zvakanaka.



No kudenga kwachinzwa

I’chitenderano change;

Na pakufa ndinga tende

Nokuti, ini ndiri wake.

title: UNA VANHU VAKO MWARI
hymn:
Una vanhu vako, Mwari,

Kudzu dzose nguva;

Unovachengeta iwe,

Pane nzvimbo dzose.

	

Kana vayambuka nzizi,

Uve navo iwe;

Kana vapiswe nomoto,

Vano chengwa newe.



Pavono kutambudzika,

Vanosimba newe;

Napane zvinovaruma,

Unova chengeta.

	

Ishe, vatarire iwe,

Ivo vanhu vako;

Vanotenda, vanofunga,

Ivo vanhu vako.

title: ISHE WANGU WAINDIDISA
hymn:
Ishe wangu! waindisisisa

Pakurasika kwangu,

Ishe wangu’wandironda,

Chete mugwara rangu,

Ndawanikwa, Ishe wangu.



Ishe wangu’, Iro’zwi rako

Ndiwoyo mwenje wangu.

Ishe’, wangu, nengoni dzako

Dzinondifarisawo,

Ndinofara, Ishe wangu!.



Ishe wangu’, noMweya wako

Undiite Mutsvene,

Ishe wangu’, kudenga rako

Iro ndimusha wangu

Ngandipinde Ishe wangu.

title: MWEYA WANGU UNEMPONISI
hymn:
Mweya wangu unomuponisi

Ndakasunungurwa:

Musununguri ngandikwanise

Ndichagamuchirwa su?

	 

Korus

Ndoda, ndoda, ndoda,

Mwari muyamuri uri wangu:

Ndakatengwa neropa ra Ishe,

Ndava wake chose.



Nengoni ndichagamuchira tsitsi,

Rudo rwako Kristu

Rwaukunda mwoyo wangu kwazvo,

Ndichavimba newe.



Unoziva kusasimba kwangu,

Ndotya kurasika,

Asi iwe uri simba rangu,

Unondipa samba.



Hongu, Ishe, tipe isu tose

Ngoni dzako nhasi,

Nezvinobva pamwoyo tichiti:“Ndichava wa Kristu”.



Vakauya vamwe vachibvunza:

“Ndingapone here”?

“hungu, ndinoda muponisiwe”.

Nesu tinodaro.

title: TIRI VAWADZANI TIRI VAWADZANI
hymn:
Tiri vawadzani, tiri vawadzani,

Mhuri ya Jesu Mambo wedu:

Dai tichidana, dai tichidana,

Hapana husvinu kudenga.

	 

Tino yamurana, tinoyamurana,

Vatendi va Ishe mukuru:

Tisingatsaukane, tisingatsukane,

Hakuno kudaro kudenga.



Tiri hondo, imwe, tiri hondo imwe,

Mbirimi dza Mambo mukuru:

Ngatimurwirei nemwoyo mumwewo,

Panzira inoenda kudenga.



Ikoko kudenga kuno rufaro bedzi,

Titende kuna’she mukuru,

Naiwo masimba anobva kuna’she

Tinosvika nawoo kwaari.

title: FARA IWE MUKRISTU
hymn:
Fara iwe M’Kristu!

Fara kuna Ishe;

Waponeswa naye,

Fara mumwoyo.

Nokutenda kwa’ri

Nawo mwoyo wako,

Uregerwe naye

Dzose mhosva dzako.



Fara iwe M’Kristu!

Watongerwa zvino;

Yakaripwa naye

Yose mhosva yako.

Na ikoko kufa

Kwa akafa nako;

Uve nokupona

Iwo mweya wako.



Fara iwe M’kristu

Fara kuna Ishe;

Uri wake iwe,

Fara nomumwoyo.

Ne misodzi yako

Upisike yose;

Tenda iwe M’kristu

Nawo mwoyo wose.

title: FAMBAI VATENDI,FAMBAI KURWA
hymn:
Fambai vatendi, fambai kurwa,

Munotungamirwa nomuchinjikwa,

Kristu Ishe wedu, mutungamiriri,

Fambai sehondo ne samba rake.

Fambai vatendi, fambai kurwa,

Munotungamirwa nomuchinjikwa.



Satana achatiza, anotya kwazvo,

Fambai vatendi, munogomukunda,

Anozunguzika namazwi enyu,

Simudzira mazwi, imbai mose.

	

Inenda sehondo kokorodzano,

Ichifamba shure vatsvene vose,

Tisatsauraniswa, muviri mumwe,

Mumwe norutendo, mumwe no rudo.



Hunungo paradzwa humambo hwose

Govero ra Jesu rinogosara,

Hondo ya Satana isingagone,

Matama a Jesu achazadziswa.



Ndizvozvo fambai, fambai nesu,

Rwiyo rwokukunda ngatiwombei;

Ngatikurumbidze kwa Kristu Ishe

Nama zuva ose asinga peri.

title: TIRI PFUMO RA SHE
hymn:
Tiri pfumo ra’She,

Tinoenda kunorwa,

Zvino tasimuka kurwa,

Hondo ya’She Kristu.

Tiri pakarema,

Asi tichafara,

Moyo yedu yasimbiswa

Nomutungamiri.



Korus

Tiri pfumo ra’She

Tinomurumbidza,

Tichamunamata iye,

Mambo wava tsvene.



Tiri pfumo ra’She

Wakakumbira,

Fara ne sita rake,

Wakamboroverwa

Pamuti munyoro:

Zvino richiripo,

Remeka zita raJesu,

Nokuti ndi Mambo.



Tiri pfumo ra’She

Tichava na Ishe:

Kana tichitambudzika

Naye Ishe wedu.

Simudza mureza

Nguva yachimbidza

Musi woku pedzisira

Kwe Pfumo ra Ishe.

title: NDANZWA IZWI RAKO
hymn:
Ndanzwa izwi rako,

Rinondidaidza,

Ndishambidze moyo wangu

Pane ropa rako.



Korus

Ndouya, Jesu!

Kwauri Ishe!

Shambidza moyo wangu

Pane ropa rako.

	

Ndashaya masimba,

Iwe uchandipa;

Uchandishambidza kwazvo,

Uchanditsvenesa.



Jesu wandi dana

Nditsvake rutendo,

Norudo no ruregerero,

Pasi nokudenga.



Jesu wasimbisa

Basa rakanaka;

Wapamhidza ngoni dzake

Pano mwoyo wangu.



Jesu wakandipa

Tsitsi dzake dzose;

Wandipa ruregerero,

No reutendo rwake.

title: RUKURU RUPONISO
hymn:
Rukuru ruponeso

RwaIshe wokudenga,

Rwa tengwa nezvikuru

Zvichibva pakudenga.



Rukuru ruponeso,

Irworwo rwakatengwa

Namaropa a Kristu,

Ayo akaparara.

	

Rukuru ruponeso,

Ndorwvo vakaipa;

Kusina unorambgwa

Kana aipa sei.



Rukuru ruponeso,

Rwabisa pakaipa

Pakuwa nokutadza.

Nokufa apano moto.



Rukuru ruponeso,

Tinoshambidza narwo,

Tino cheneswa narwo,

Tifanane na Jesu.



Rukuru ruponeso

Rwuripo pana Ishe

Tinodya nhaka narwo

Yohupenyu kudenga.



Rukuru ruponeso

Kana tikaruramba;

Topona nechiyiko

Takarurambisisa?

title: NDIRI MUROMBO ASI
hymn:
Ndiri murombo asi

Ndachengetwa na Mwari;

Wandifukidza nguo.

Anondipa zvokudzya.

	

Kana ndichiteura

Anonzwa nguva dzose;

Kana ndichikotsira

Haanokundisiya.



Mubati wokudenga

Waiva M’romo seni;

Wakandiparidzira

Ropa rakanakisa.



Kana ndiri mubasa

Anondikomborera;

Kuzoti ndabva pano

Ndichazorora naye.



Zvino ndinomukudza

Nokutenda kwaari;

Uku kufara kwangu

Ndachengetwa na Mwari.

title: VAZHINJI VANAYO NHAKA
hymn:
Vazhinji vanayo nhaka

Yavanozvivinzwa nayo;

Vazhinji vanayo pfuma

Vanozvifarisa nayo.



Handizvidzi zvipo zvako

Zvohu hupenyu huripo;

Asi iwe Ishe Jesu

Uri nhaka yangu kwazvo.

	

Kunyange ndanga ndisina

Zvinhu zvoruno rugaro;

Ndinewe muridzi wazvo,

Ndine zvinhu zvose newe.



Kana wava wangu Jesu

Ndakwana ne zvinhu zvose;

Nezvi zviripo ndezvangu,

Ne zvinouya ndezvangu.



Ne ino nyika ndeyangu,

Na iro denga nderangu;

Na ho hupenyu ndehwangu,

Nokunakirwa ndokwangu.



Hahu peri ihohupenyu,

Hwuri nhaka yangu newe;

Kunakirwa hakuepere,

Kwandakawana kunewe.

title: NGANDIBERERKE MAPUDZI
hymn:
Ngandibereke mapudzi,

Ayo oMweya Mutsvene,

Ohunhu nokururama,

Ndoramo no mwoyo chena,

Izvozvose zvorutendo,

Nezvo rudo norufaro.

	

Izvo zvinhu ngazvikure

Mumwoyo nenguva dzose,

Kose uku kumanikwa,

Kwehusvinu nokwetsino,

Nokwe zvinhu zvinobvako.



Hogu, Ishe, naganditunge,

Ndivewo unobereka,

Ndivavarire kuwana

Zvosewo zvakarurama

Zvigo rega kuzorambwa

Hose hunhu nadzo tsika.

title: 89. URWO RUTENDO RUKURU
hymn:
Urwo rutendo rukuru

Rwunotenda somucheche,

Norudo rwe basa rako

Ngandipihwe Mwari irwo

Ngarukunde mwoyo wangu

Ndiparidze dzama rako.



Ndipe rudo rwunopisa

Ndichemere vanotadza,

Ngaruvepo rwundipise,

Ndivadzore pane ngozi,

Ndivadzore panzira

Yaunoponesa nayo.

	 

Ngandibvume nazvinoka,

Ndizvipire vakatdza

Vasingazivi muponisi:

Ndivavarire ndikwane

Vose navariparima

Vasafe vasamuziva.



Samba rangu nazvo zvose

Zvipo Baba zvandiinavo

Ngazviitwe basa newe

Ndifambise dama rako,

Ndiudze vatadzi vose

Kuti Jesu I’hama yavo.



Ngaupiswe mwoyo wangu, 

Uzadzise rudo rwako,

Ndiyedze nesimba rose

Ndivade kufana newe,

Ndiuye navo kwauri

Mufudzi wakavafira.

title: SIPITI RETSITSI NENGONI
hymn:
Sipiti retsitsi ne ngoni

Tinaro muripiri wedu,

Iro razarurirwa isu

Naani anoda kuuya.

	

Korus

Ishe Jehova unotida

Ku tironi yake kudenga;

Tiyende kurwizi tichinwa

Mvura yehupenyu kudenga.

	 

Tinoti tatenda kwaari,

Tipihwe mweya wo’regero;

Tipihwe nengoni tifare

Kugamuchira dzi ngoni dzake.



Tinopihwa rudo rwake,

Tipinde narwo pahupenyu,

Tinonzwa chokwadi rufaro

Rwunenge ndorwa pakudenga.

title: IVO VANHU VARI VOGA
hymn:
Ivo vanhu vari voga,

Ivo vanhu vako,

Vanotenda iwe Mwari,

Ivo vanhu vako.



Vanodzidza tsika dzako,

Vachengete idzo;

Mirau yako vanoida,

Vachengete iyo.



Vanovenga izvo zvose,

Zvonovengwa newe;

Vanoda zvinhu zvose,

Zvinodiwa newe.



Vakadaro ivo vanhu,

Nero samba rako;

Vanowana kusimbiswa,

Nemirau yako.

title: NDIRI WAKO ISHE JESU
hymn:
Ndiri wako Ishe, Jesu,

Unondiregerera;

Zvndarasa zvakaipa

Ukati uriwangu.



Ndiri wako Ishe, Jesu,

Neni wandinyaradza;

Wakandi wudza ne ngoni,

Kuti uri wangu.



Zvandigere Ishe Jesu,

Neni ndosimba newe;

Ndinofadzwa, ndinofara,

Uri wanguwo Jesu.



Zvandiri kufamba Jesu,

Ndiri mweni ipapa;

Ndinoda kuzova newe,

Nokuti uri wangu.

title: MUFUDZI NDIYE JEHOVA
hymn:
Mufudzi ndiye Jehova,

Wakandi chengeta;

Kushaya hakungavepo,

Unovimba naye.



Pana mafuro manyoro,

Ndinodyisa napo

Ndinorara nokutara,

Ndisinga vundutswe.

	

Unomutsa no nomweya,

Unouponesa;

Kururama ndova nako,

Na iye mufudzi.



Kana ndifamba pa rima,

Handingatye chinhu;

Nokuti iwe uneni

Unondifarisa.



Chidyiro ini ndinacho

Mberi pavavengi;

Mafuta pamsoro wangu

Handishayi chinhu.



Kururama nadzo tsitsi

Dzinonditevera;

Pane imba ya Jehova,

No kusingaperi.

title: KUNAMATA KUNA ISHE
hymn:
Kunamata kuna Ishe

Hakui kom’romo wega:

No kuenda pa kudenga

Hakusi kutaura kwega.



Kugara nokwe nduramo,

Kuchengetanwe ne tsitsi,

Kutaura ne zvirokwazvo,

Kuagara kuno hutsvene.

	

Kubva pane chakaipa,

No mwoyo wakasimbisa;

Kuenda kuna ‘ye Ishe,

No kutya kurumbidza.

title: NDITARIRE NOKUFARA
hymn:
Nditarire nokufara,

Ishe wangu!

Ndiwe wanga wandifira,

Ishe wangu!

Waburuka denga rako,

Uchisiya ‘penyu hwako,

Ndanzwa ruponiso rwako.

Ishe wangu!



Ndandigere pae rima,

Ishe wangu!

Ndadnoenda pane rufu,

Ishe wangu!

Dzakuya nhume dzako,

Dzandinzwisa dama rako,

Dzandiudza tsitsi dzako,

Ishe wangu!



Ngandidzinzwe ngoni dzako,

Ishe wangu!

Ndive muponiswa wako,

Ishe wangu!

Zvakaipa ngazvipere,

Mwoyo uve no hutsvene,

Ndinzwe undireverere,

Ishe wangu!

title: TIMUTSIRE ISHE
hymn:
Timutsire Ishe,

Huya kuvatsvene,

Taura namasimba ako,

Vanhu vako vanzwe.



Korus

Timutsire Ishe, kana titeura,

Buruka, Ishe, buruka, utikomborere.



Timutsire Ishe,

Mutsa zita rako,

Ngarwubvire rudo rwako,

Pane mwoyo yose.



Timutsire Ishe,

Utiropafadze,

Ngarinzwiwe dama rako,

Rakanaka kwazvo.



Timutsire Ishe,

Tidirire mweya,

Ngakuve hutsvene newe,

Utiropafadze.

title: NDITUNGAMIRE JEHOVA
hymn:
Nditungamire, Jehova,

Ndiri mufambi ishe;

Unesimba, in’handina,

Ndashaya samba ini;

O Mponisi!

Ndiwe inhowo yangu.



Iro tsime ro’poniso

Razarurirwa ini;

Ngariyerere ndipone,

Rishambe zvakaipa.

O Mponisi!

Iwe ndosimba newe.



Kuti ndasvika Jordani,

Chibisa kutya kwangu;

Ndiperekedze ndouya,

Chindichengeta ini,

O Mponisi!

Iwe ndovimba newe.

title: ISABATA NHASI ISHE
hymn:
I Sabata nhasi Ishe,

Iro zuva rako;

Vanofara vanhu vako,

Ne’ro zuva rako.

	

Wakamuka nhasi Ishe,

Pane guva rako;

Waka kunda nhasi kufa,

No kukumuka kwako.



Wakamuka iwe M’soro,

Wavo vanotenda;

Tichamuka nesu tose,

Isu Tinotenda.



Ngarinzwiwe dama rako

Navazhinji nhasi;

Ngavamutswe pano rufu,

Vave newe nhasi.



Tinotenda iwe Jesu,

Pano pa’mba yako;

Tine zvinhu zvose isu,

No kumuka kwako.

title: NGUVA YAKANAKA JESU
hymn:
Nguva yakanaka Jesu,

Yokupinda’mba yako,

Tine zvinhu zvosae isu,

No kumuka kwako.



Gara nesu zuva  rino,

Tiropafadze tose;

Tipe mwoyo wokufunga,

Matama okupona.

	

Titarise mudzizdzisi,

Tinoda kuponeswa;

Tichiri patsoka dzako,

Tichinzwisa matama.



Tizarure nzeve dzedu,

Ne mwoyo yedo yose;

Titungamire panzira,

Kuti tisatsaukane.



Tiitire takapfava,

Kuti tizvipfavise;

Tipe samba roKuita,

Zvinhu zvakarurama.



Mwari dama rako nhasi,

Ngarive nokuyedza;

Isu tigere murima,

No mumvuri wokufa.



Matama ako ngaave,

Simbiriso muupfu,

Inoita basa rayo

Kuti hupfu huvire.



Tinoda kuve zvapupu,

Zve ngoni dzatinadzo;

Toda kuti vanhu vose

Varinzwe dama rako.

title: ISHE TAUNGANA
hymn:
Ishe taungana

Muno mumba yako,

Huya newe zvatipinda,

Ishe mberi kwako.



Iyo mwoyoyedu

Inokurwarira,

Nayo mweya yedu Ishe

Ino kutarira.



Hurukuro dzako

Baba ngatidzinzwe;

Razarurwa dama rako

Newe ngatikunzwe.



Ngautigadzire,

Isu vanhu vako;

Kana, tafa, tipinzeowo

Kune denga rako.

title: ZVATAPINDA ISHE WEDU
hymn:
Zvatapinda Ishe wedu

Kune Imba yako,

Titarire Mwari wedu

Nedzi tsitsi dzako.



Imba iyi imba yako,

Imba yo hutsvene;

Ihe huya tisangane,

Utiropafadze.

	

Tinobvama zvakaipa,

Mberi kwako Ishe;

Tinokukumbira isu,

Zvino mberi kwako.



Zvakaipa zvatiinazvo,

Iwe unoziva;

Tinochema naizvozvo,

Nayo mweya yose.



Tifadzise Ishe wedu

No ‘regero rwako;

Tipupure Mwari wedu,

Noyu mweya wako.



Rataurirwa dama rako,

Ngatirinzwe tose;

Tichiva nomwenje isu,

Pane nguva dzose.

title: ISHE WE SABATA
hymn:
Inzwa Ishe we Sabata,

Neri uva rako;

Inzwa nokuimba kwedu,

Muno mumba yako.



Tinokurumbidza isu,

Iro basa rako,

Rafanira kurumbidzwa,

Navatengwa vako.

	 

Isabata dzapa nyika,

Tinodzida idzo,

Asi iyo yokudenga,

Tinosuwa iyo.



Nezvo chiteerera Ishe

Kukumbira kwedu;

Utigadzirire iyo

Yose mwoyo yedu.



Tive nokukurumbidza,

Zvatichiri pano;

Titsvake rufadzo rwako

Ipapo kudenga.

title: SABATA INOPERA
hymn:
Sabata inopera,

Murairi wopedza;

Ngative nokutenda.

Izwi ratanga tanzwa;

Izwi i’guru kwazvo,

Ra Ishe wokudenga,

Vasati vari matsi,

Vabva vakwanisiswa.



M’rairi watiraira

Izwi dai richigara,

Rurege kanganikwa

Ipo pamwoyo yedu;

	

Izwi rokuveneka,

Izwi rokuratidza,

Izwi rokufara,

Ipo pamweya yedu.



Sabata dzopfuura

Dai tichiteerera,

Tichirirangarira,

Izwi rapana Ishe;

Tigozonoti kana

Tabva pano payika,

Tigopinda pasondo

Yepamsoro kudenga.

title: BABA TINOUYA 8.5.8.3.
hymn:
Baba wedu tinouya

Kuzonamata,

Kuti wakatichengeta

Nokuda.



Iwe wakatuma Jesu

Kunyika yedu,

Kuti unotida isu

Zvikuru.



Wakaparidza kwatiri

Rudo ne tsitsi;

Wakashuma kuti Mwari 

Ndi Baba.

	 

Jesu akagotifira

Pamuti uyu;

Zvino wakatiregerera

Netsitsi.



Zvakaipa zvedu zvose

Wakazvitora;

Mhosva dzedu wakaripa

Nokufa.



Baba tinokutendawo

Kuti watida;

Tichaidza basa rako

Nokuda.

title: TAURA NESU ISHE
hymn:
Taura nesu Ishe wedu,

Uti nzwise dama rako;

Taura nomimwoyo yedu,

Utinzwise rudo rwako.



Tiri pano mberi kwako,

Tidzidzise Mponisi;

Utidzore, Baba Mwari,

Kudzu dzose nzira dzedu.



Inzwa muteuro wedu

Utipindure ne tsitsi;

Mutsa nokufunga kwedu,

Tiri dise dama rako.

title: ISHE TIGADZIRIRE 7.7.7.7.7.7.
hymn:
Ishe tigadzirire

Nguva yokuteura,

Tinopfugama mabvi

Ngatifunge kwauri;

Uvenesu Mponisi,

Tipo rufaro rwako.



Toswedra kwauri,

Tinzwise samba rako,

Tinochema savana

Kuna Baba wa vose,

Tiri pamberi pako,

Tine kutya kutsvene.



Tinofunga Mponisi,

Chitenderano chako

Wakati, “Ndinotuma

Mweya Mutsvene wangu”.

Zarura mwoyo yedu,

Kuti timugamuchire.

title: GADZIRA MITEURO 7.7.7.7.
hymn:
Gadzira miteuro,

Jesu anoda kunzwa;

Iye wakuratidza,

Haagoni kuramba.

	

Unouya ku Mambo,

Huya ne mikumbiro;

Anengoni nesimba,

Kumbira unopihwa.



Ndotanga no mutoro,

Bias zvakaipa zvangu,

Shambidza mwoyo wangu

Ne ropa rako, Ishe.



Ndotsvaka kuzorora,

Gara pa mwoyo wangu;

Bias zvose zviripo,

Ndive temberi yako.



Kana ndiri mufambi,

Ndifarise norudo;

Uve mutungamiriri,

Uve nhowo yangu.

title: FAMBA MANGWANA-NGWANA
hymn:
Famba mangwanangwana,

Famba masikati,

Famba zuva radoka,

Famba pahusiku,

Famba no mwoyo M‘tsvene,

Urege kutyiswa,

Upfugame nemabvi,

Teura kwaari.

	

Kumbirira shamwari,

Vose unovada;

Kumbirira vavengi,

Rega kuvasiya.

Shure kwezvo kumbira

Chaunotsvaka woga

Nero zita ra Jesu

Mununuri wako.



Kana washaya nzvimbo

Yokugara woga,

Kana varipo vamwe,

Zvimwe une basa;

Simudza mwoyo wako,

Mwari anokunzwa,

Kufunga kwedu kose

Kunozibwa naye.



Kana wawona nhamo

Teura kwaari;

Naparufaro rwako

Tenda kuna Mwari;

Samba raakatipa

Rinokunda zvose,

Samba rokuteura

Kuna Mwari wedu.

title: MWARI WEDU TAKAPINDA
hymn:
Mwari wedu takapinda,

Panzvimbo yokunamata;

Iwe wakatipindisa,

Tidzidzise kururama.

	

Yemura muranda wako

Pane midzidziso yake;

Burukisa mwenje wako,

Venekera mweya wake.



Zarura ne nzeve dzedu,

Tiri zive iri dama;

Bias kuremera kwedu,

Nohurema hwe marudzi.



Ngatipone pakaipa,

Nairoro dama rako;

Ngatipinde pakudenga,

Naidzodzo ngoni dzako.

title: TIMUTSIRIRE ISHE
hymn:
Timutsirire, Ishe,

Titeure kwauri,

Tivirimise, Ishe,

Tifunge kwauri.

Kukudzwa kwako Jesu

Ngakuchitifadza:

No rudo rwako Jesu

Rwupise kwatiri.

	 

Tiregoneta isu

Pa rukudzo rwako;

Tisatonhore isu

Pano rudo rwako;

O Ishe! tibvumise,

Tikudise iwe.

title: BABA WEDU WOKUDENGA
hymn:
Baba wedu wokudenga,

Baba wedu tose,

Unengoni dzakanyanya,

Pane vanhu vose.



Ngaribatwe nohutsvene,

Iro zita rako;

Ngarikumbidzwe Ishe,

Navo vanhu vose.



Ihoho humambo hwako,

Ngahuwuye ihwo;

Hudzikunde hondo dzako,

Dzi gamchire ihwo.



Ngakuitwe kuda kwako,

Pane niyka dzose,

Sezvakunoitwawo

Pane denga rose.

	 

Nhasi tipe sadza redu,

Rinotikwanisa;

Dyisa nohupenyu hwedu,

Kose kudya kwedu.



Tiregere zvakaipa,

Nemhosva dzeduwo;

Nesu vane mhosva dzedu

Tinovaregerera.



Utidzore pakaipa,

Kana tichiyedzwa,

Tinunure pakaipa

Kana tichiyedzwa.



Hushe hwose ndohwako,

Namasimba ose,

Nyamba kurumbizwa kwako

Hakunozopera.

title: WAISA MURAU JESU
hymn:
Waisa murau Jesu

Kwavari varanda vako,

Endai kunyika dzose,

Mudzidzise rudzi rwose.



Vanotenda vamarudzi,

Vagamchire dama rako,

Wakati vaombekei,

Vachengete tsika dzako.

	

Vakadaro ivo, Ishe,

Vakazvinzwa vakatenda,

Vauya kuzoombekwa,

Kuti kuwoneswe iko.



Torumbidza iwe Baba,

Nomwanankomana ishe,

Newe Mweya wohutsvene,

Torumbidza Mwari woga.

title: TITARIRE ISHE
hymn:
Titarire Ishe,

Utiudze nesu,

Izvo zvakavanda zvako,

Nesu ngatizive.

	

Utiropafadze,

Izvi zvatinodya,

Kuti tigamchire isu,

Nokutenda kwedu.



Izvi zvinhu zvose,

Zvorusero rwako,

Ita kuti tizvione,

Zvirokwazvo zvako.

title: WAKATORA CHIPAPATA
hymn:
Wakatora Chipapata

Ukachimedura

Ukati torai mudye,

Zvomuviri wangu.



Jesu watora mukombe,

Wati ngamutende,

Ndo chitenderano chitsva,

Pane ropa rangu.

	

Tino tora chipapata,

Totarira iwe;

Totora tidye tose,

Tichisuwa iwe.



Tinotora nomukombe,

Tichivimba newe,

Timwe kwauri tose,

Tichifunga iwe.

title: WAFA WAFA MUPONISI
hymn:
Wafa, wafa, Mponisi!

Akafira vakatyora

Nemirau yake;

Wakafira kuponisa,

Wakafira kuvapinza

Kune denga rake.

	 

Kwete, tsitsi hadziperi!

Kwete, ngoni dzichiripo

Nyamba takatadza,

Ishe unotinanisa,

Ishe unotinyadzisa,

Nezva unoita.



Ishe chifungiso chako,

Chokutiripira kwako,

Dzose mhosva dzedu,

Ngachigare nguva dzose,

Tinzwe ngoni dzako, Tenzi,

Pane mwoyo yedu.

title: ISU VANHU TINOPERA
hymn:
Isu vanhu tinopera,

Kufa uku kwaswedera,

Uhwu hupenyu hupfupi,

Tinongofa pakarepo.



Vakare vanga’varipo

Panyika havasisipo,

Vakati roto pakufa,

Vakarova pane guva.



Vaend’ivo pa kutonga,

Unotonga ko kudenga;

Iye unobvunza vose

Zvinhu zvavaita zvose.

	 

Isu nesu tinoendako,

Tinogotevera ivo;

Zvose zvakaipa zvedu

Unogotibvunza izvo.



Ngatigadzirire izvo,

Ngatitange zvinozvino;

Ngatirege kuipa kwose,

Ngaituchirire tose.

title: MUVIRI WANGU WOFA
hymn:
Muviri wangu wofa,

Unorinda pa guva,

Unokwira mweya wangu,

Unopona pa guva.



Nyama inozodyiwa;

Ne honye pane guva;

Weya unemusha wangu,

Uri ikoko kudenga.

title: KWASARA MAKORE 6.6..8.6
hymn:
Kwasara makore,

Ne nguva shomana

Tinoenda kuva navo

Vari pamakuva.

	

Korus

Mweya wangu Ishe,

Ngaururamiswe,

Ndishambidze pane ropa,

Bisa zvakaipa.



Kwasaramazuva

Atinawo isu;

Shure kwezvo tichaenda

Kuno mutongisi.



Kwasara ne nhamo,

Dzatinongowona;

Tinoenda pasina nhamo,

Niyka yakanaka.



Kwasara misodzi,

Nezvo zvinorema;

Tichawonana na Baba,

Pasino kuchema.



Kwasara masondo,

Mazuva matsvene;

Tichamunamata Mwari,

Kune denga rake.



Kwasara chinguva,

Achauya Jesu,

Wakambotifira kuti,

Tive ne humambo.

title: UNOUYA UYO MUSI
hymn:
Unouya uyo musi

Wa totongwa nawo;

Tinomira isu tose

Panzvimbo ’mwechete.



Dzigosvika ngirozi,

Kusarura vako;

Vanokwidzwa avo vese,

Ivo vanhu vako.



Ivo vanhu vako Jesu

Vanodaidzirwa;

Vasedere nokufara

Vvauye kunewe.



Unoti kuna ‘vo vako,

Swederai imi!

Muuye, imi, va Baba

Munodya hupenyu.



Unozoti kune vamwe

Chiendai imi!

Endai pa gomba ro moto,

Handikuzuviyi!

title: WAUYA! WAUYA! MUCHEKI MUKURU
MUMHANZI URI KUDENGA
hymn:
Mumhanzi uri kudenga,

Kana kuzoridzwa iwo,

No kuriridza kukuru,

Kana kuzonzwikwa iko,

Kuparure namakuva,

Kutsemure na pa nyika.

	

Negungwa rinobvisa

Ivavo varakamedza,

Nenyika inobvisa

Vose vakanga vavigwa;

Vamukire pano rufu,

Vanoenda pakutongwa.



Vati ivo vakafira

Pane zvakaipa zvavo,

Nenguva yavanoona

Ichocho chityiso chavo;

Vawe vose pane gomba

Vakandirwe pane moto.



Ndivo vakanaka voga,

Vanopona noyo musi;

Ndavakatongerwa vega,

Vanozo pinda kudenga,

Vaine mibairo yavo,

Vaina M’ponisi wavo.

title: CHINHU CHINOTYISA KWAZVO
hymn:
Chinhu chinotyisa kwazvo,

Zuva ro kupera;

Kana Ishe achitonga,

Ko kupedzisira.



Kuriko no kuvandana,

Pane ino nyika

Naikoku kuvatana,

Kouya pachena.

	 



Pane nyika kunotadzwa

Pasina kunzwika;

Nyamba kwose kwakanzwika,

No muzivi zvose.



Nero zuva pa mibvunzo

Kuno nzwika zvose

Zvakaitiwa panyika,

Ku marudzi ose.



Ngavadzoke vakaipa

Pa kuipa kwavo;

Teurai nhasi mese

Kumusununguri.

title: MUSI WEHASHA NOKUTYA
hymn:
Musi wehasha no kutya,

Musi wekuchema kwazvo,

Achazadziswa matama

Avaprofita vakare.



Achauya kuzo pisa,

Denga nenyika ne zvose,

Mutongi mukuru Jesu.

Tinogoitaseiko?



Hedzo, Manzi dzicharira,

Vachadzinzwa pa mzakuva.

Vapenyu navashakabvu,

Vanoenda kunotengeswa.

	 

Nyika inogo riridza,

Anogo shama makuva,

Zvinhu zvose zvichamuka

Zvinogopindura Ishe.



Urwo rugwaro rutsvene,

Mune zviito zva vanhu,

Runogoverengwa na’She,

Zvose zviiswe pachena.



	Part 2

Mutongi zvaakagara,

Anotonga zvinhu zvose,

Nozvo zvakanga zvavanda,

Mabasa namatamawo.



Ndinogoita Seiko?

Tsitsi dzinogobvepiko?

Anondiyamura ani?

No musi uyo wo kutya.



Mambo wohutsvene, iwe

Wakatipa Muponsi,

Tiitire tsitsi Ishe,

Musi uyo wu kutongwa.



Iwe Jesu waivo munhu,

Nenzira ye ruponiso,

Rega kundisiya zvino,

Ndive mutandwi na Mwari.

	 



Wakambonditsvakisisa,

Wakambondifira ini,

Basa rako guru, Ishe,

Haringandiponese, nhai?



	Part 3



Mutongi wakarurama,

Ndiregere zvakaipa,

Ndiitire titsi Mwari,

Musi usati wasvika.



Hongu ndinemhosva ini,

Ndinonyara mberi kwako,

Ndinochema kwazvo kwazvo,

Ndirege’re Mwari wangu.



Iwe wakamboponesa

Mukadzi wakaipisa,

Ne mbavha pamuchinjikwa,

Ndiitire tsitsi neni.



Zvikomero zvangu zvose,

Nayo minamato yangu,

Haina basa jehova,

Chete ndochemera tsitsi.



Ndiise ne hwai dzako,

Ndirege kuva ne mbudzi,

Pa rudyi rwako kudenga

Ndopa ndinoda kugara.

	 

Ndinopfugama ne tsitsi,

Ndinorwarira zvitadzo,

Hona, Mwari, moyo wangu,

Huya kuzondiponesa.

title: PAMSORO PAKUDENGA
hymn:
Pamsoro pakudenga

Ndavakanaka vega,

Pamsoro pakudenga

Kuna vatsvene vega.



Anoda kuendako

Ngaazviteurire;

Anozogadzirirwa

No Mweya wo hutsvene.



Jesu wakatifira

Kupere mhosva yedu,

Kuti tiitwe vatsvene,

Naiyo mweya yedu.



Kuti kana tavingwa

No rufu pano pasi,

Tirege kuzorambwa

Kuenda pa kudenga

title: PAKUDENGA KUNA BABA
hymn:
Pakudenga kuna Baba

Kwakanaka kwazvo;

Pakudenga kuna Baba

Kwakafara kwazvo.

	

Hakupindi chakaipa,

Kana chiri chimwe;

Hakupindi zvokurwara,

Ne chirwere chimwe.



Ndavatsvene ivo vose,

Vanogara iko;

Vanokuda vanamate,

Iwe Mwari wavo.



Vakawana musha wavo,

Musha wokugara;

Vakawana nohupenyu,

Husingapfuure.



Ndiri mweni pane nyika,

Ndinosuwa denga;

Ngandipinde newe jesu,

Ndiyende kudenga.

title: DOMBO NDIPE MESO NDIONE
hymn:
Dombo ndipe meso ndione,

Pa uzuru kudenga.

Ndiva one vanoutsvene

Vanofara kuna’She.

	

Zviya zvavaiva panyika,

Vachichema misodzi;

Vaimanikwa no kuyedzwa,

Muyedzi achiyedza.



Ndakaona negwara rake,

Ndikabvunza makadi?

Ndiyeyo wanga waitfira,

Wanga wafira isu.



Vakawona negwara rake,

Raenda pahupenyu;

Vakafamba pa gwara rake,

Vazorora kudenga.



Nagarumbidzwe M’tungamiriri.

Zva atiungamirira;

Kusashaike muteveri,

Panero gwara rake.

title: JERUSAREM, MUSHA WANGU
hymn:
Jerusarem, musha wangu,

Musha wakanaka!

Kana ndapedza mabasa,

Ndinoenda kwa uri.



Ndichauwona rinhiko,

Uyo musha wangu?

Une dzimba dzakanaka,

Nokudya kutsvene.

	 

Hapasisina kuipa,

Hapana nenhamo

Ndinoramba ndichienda,

Ku musha mutsvene.



Ndingatye here kurwadza?

Ndingatize kufa?

Kwete ndinoenda kannan,

Nyika yandinoda.



Vaprofita, vadzidzisi,

Vakafira Jesu,

Varipo pamwe na Kristu,

Neni ndichaenda.



Jerusarem musha wangu,

Wa ndinotsvakisa!

Kana ndasvika kwauri,

Ndichafara kwazvo.

title: NZVIMBO YAKANAKA!
hymn:
Nzvimbo yakanaka!

Musha wa Jehova,

Denga ra matenga,

Denga ro hutsvene!

Iyo nzvimbo yakanaka

Ndinoenda rinhikwairi?

	 

Anoenda muyenzi,

Oda kuzorora:

Hama dzangu musha

Uriko kudenga.

Iyo nzvimbo yakanaka

Ndinoenda rinhikwairi?



Pano tadzikira

Matente panyika,

Hausiri musha,

Tinawo kudenga,

Iyo nzvimbo yakanaka

Ndinoenda rinhikwairi?



Hapana misodzi

Kumsoro kudenga;

Hapana nokufa

Nezvo zvikomero.

Iyo nzvimbo yakanaka

Ndinoenda rinhikwairi?



Zviyedzo zvisipo,

Nezvitadzo zvose;

Ndichazororako

No M’ponisi wangu:

Iyo nzvimbo yakanaka

Ndinoenda rinhikwairi?

title: NGUVA YAKANAKISISA
hymn:
Nguva yakanakisisa

Yokukurumbidza,

Kana tadzoredzaniswa

Pamsoro kudenga:

Ndizvozvo tichinzwa mazwi

E chisimbisiso,

Chokuti kana tikafa

Pane ino nyika.



Korus

Tinosangana kudenga

Ne ropa ra Jesu:

Nokutenda kuna jesu

Tichasanganiswa.



Kunakisa ko rugare

Kwaka sunga moyo:

Isu kana taungana

Pa zita ra Kristu

Mwanakomana wa Baba

Wakakomborerwa,

Chifungidziro chokuti

Tichasanganiswa.



Hongu, no kukurumidza,

Kukunda madzudzo;

Tsoka dzedu dzakaneta

Dzichayambukira.

	 

Zambuko rinendarama.

Pa vakagarira,

Avo vanotida isu,

Kuripo kufara.



Kana takatsaukaniswa

Kukange kwasvika

Na mazuva mashomana

Makore mashoma

Tichava naye Mponisi,

Pane idzo nzvimbo

Dzatinoreverwa kunzi

Tichasanganiswa.

title: NDINOFARA KUTI BABA WEDU
hymn:
Ndinofara kuti Baba wedu

Wareva rudo rwake rukuru,

Pa rugwaro rwake rwakanaka,

Wakandiudza Jesu wandida.



Korus

Ndinofara Jesu wandida

Anondida, anondida;

Ndinofara jesu wandida,

Ini anondida.



Kana ndichimukanganwa iye,

Asi anogondiyeuchidza

Zvino kwa ari ndinodzokera,

Ndofunga kuti Jesu wandida.

	 

Jesu anondida ini kwazvo,

Kuti wandipa hupenyu hwake;

Kutadza kwangu wakakufira

Ndoziva kuti Jesu wandida.



Mwoyo wangu unomuyamuri,

Ndinotenda Jesu mununuri;

Zvino ndinogomubatirira,

Nokuti ndonzwa Jesu wandida.

title: AMAI NE VANA
hymn:
Amai ne vana

Vauya kuna Jesu,

Vadzidzi vavadzizvira

Vachiti, “ibvai”,

Asi Jesu haabvumi

Wati kuna vakukutu.

“Regai vaduku vauye kwandiri”.



“Ndinovagamuchira,

Ndinogovapfungata,

Ndichava Mufudzi wavo,

Musavarambise;

Ndinoda vaduku vose

Vagare hupenyu neni

Regai vaduku musavarambise”.



Jesu wakapfava,

Wakavaropafadza;

Nyamba zvihuru zvavana

Vasati vamuziva;

	

Havana matama ake,

Havanzwe kuti wadaro,

“Regai vaduku musavarambise”.



Tinokuteura

Kuti marudzi ose

Asiye vamwari vavo

Vaue kwauri.

Uvavenekere Mwari,

Uve navo nohupenyu,

Uva dzidzise vauye kwauri.

title: NDIROPAFADZE JESU
JESU UNOSHOVEDZA VADUKU
hymn:
Jesu, unoshovedza vaduku,

Ndinouya;

Bata ruoko rwangu no rwako,

Muponisi.

Nditungamire kana ndatsuka,

Ndabatwa na Satana muvengi.



Ndinofunga kuti tsoka dzako,

Dzakanaka;

Dzanga dzichifamba pane nzira,

Nzira yangu;

Iwe wanga uchiri mucheche,

Wakavakudza vazvari vako.



Jesu ndipe mwoyo wo kufunga,

Muponisi;

So mwoyo wako mwoyo muchena,

Gara neni.

Shure kwezvo ndinogokuziva,

Ndinogokura nokuchenjera.



Ndinogokurumbidza Muponisi,

Misi yose;

Pakutamba napa basa rangu,

Ndichaimba.

Ndiyamure pakuedza kwangu,

Ndidzidzise yose mirau yako.

title: NDITUNGAMIRE KUNA JESU
hymn:
Nnditungamire, nditungamire,

Ndoda kuenda kuna Jesu:

Ndiye Mponisi, ndingamutende,

Ndoda kumuwona, ndiratidze.



Nditungamire, ndiye Mufudzi,

Mwoyo wake wakapfavisa;

Achitidana vana vaduku;

Achindidana mwana wake.



Ndouya Jesu, Mponisi wangu,

Ndipe tsitsi dzako ne ngoni;

Ndinokutenda, ndikugamuchire,

Ndoda kuzvirurama sewe.

title: NHASI NDINOFARA INI
hymn:
Nhasi ndinofara ini

Nairo ropa rangu:

Vashamwari munodini?

Ngatifare neniwo.

Ishe ndinokurumbidza

Iwe wandidzidzisa.

Ndigogona kuakunda

Ose magwaro angu.



Kana ndiri muchikoro

Zvakanaka kwandiri:

Kana ndapinda musvondo

Ndinofara zvikuru.

	 

Ishe ndinokurumbidza

Iwe wandidzidzisa.

Ndigogona kuakunda

Ose magwaro angu.



Kune ino nyika yedu

Magwaro hatizivi:

Vavagere madzibaba

Rufaro vasinarwo.

Ishe ndinokurumbidza

Iwe wandidzidzisa.

Ndigogona kuakunda

Ose magwaro angu.



Ngandigare ndichitenda

Nairo ropa rangu,

Kudzamarare kupere

Kugara pano kwangu.

Ishe ndinokurumbidza

Iwe wandidzidzisa.

Ndigogona kuakunda

Ose magwaro angu.

title: ISHE WOHUTSVENE
hymn:
Ishe wo hutsvene,

Chimbonzwa isu;

Zva tinopfugama,

Tiropafadze.

	 

Zva uri Mutsvene,

Ishe wedenga,

Uchiteerera

Pa kunamata.



Tichiri vaduku,

Tashaya samba;

Titungamirire

Pa nzira yako.



Tidzore pa mhosva

Mazuva ose,

Yamura vaduku

Kukunda kwazvo.



Zva tinoshovedzwa

Tiende uko,

Tichazodavira,

“Tauya Jesu”.

title: NDOUYA 6.6.6.5.
hymn:
Ndouya ku Jesu,

Anondifarisa,

Anetsitsi neni,

Pa nhamu yangu.



Korus

Ndouya ku Jesu

Ndinogofara,

Anoshevedzera

Vaduku seni.

	 

Ndouya ku Jesu,

Anonzwa kwandiri.

Anondida kwazvo,

Wandiyamura.



Ndouya ku Jesu,

Anondibatsira

Anditungamire

Kunyika yake.



Ikoko kudenga

Ndichachava mutsvene,

Ndichawona Jessu,

M’ponisi wangu.

title: CHIRIKO CHIKOMO KURE
hymn:
Chiriko chikomo kure

Kunze kwoyo musha,

Pa wakaroverwa Ishe,

Pa wakafira.



Hatizivi isu vanhu

Kurwadza kwakadi;

Wakarembera pamuti

Ne nzira yevanhu.



Wakafa kuti tipone,

Tivevakanaka,

Kuti tiende kudenga,

Tiponeswe naye.

	 

Pakanga pasina mumwe

Wo kutinunura,

Ndiye wakava nesimba

Kutipinza denga.



Jesu wakatida isu

Tisati tamuda,

Takafanira kutenda

Nokumuda kwazvo.

title: MUFUDZI NDIROPAFADZE
hymn:
Mufudzi ndiropafadze,

Ndiri hwayana yako;

Ndichengete pausiku,

Kudzamare mangwana.



Wandiperekedza nhasi,

Ndokutenda mauro ano;

Wakapinda imba yangu,

Wakandipa nokudya.



Ndiregere zvakaipa,

Fadzisa hama dzangu,

Ngandiend’uko kudenga,

Pa ndinoda kugara.

title: NDOZVIISA PANA JESU
hymn:
Ndozviisa pa Jesu

Zvakaipa zvangu;

Anonditakurira,

Mutoro mukuru:

Ndouisa ku Jesu

Mhosva dzangu dzose,

Ndinoda kushambidzwa,

Nditsveneswe kwazvo.



Ndinokumbira ku Jesu

Zvose zvanda shaya,

Anorapa zvirwere,

Anondinunura

Ndouisa ku Jesu

Dambudziko rangu,

Anondisunungura,

Tinogoverana.



Ndozorora pa Jesu 

Mweya wakeneta,

Ndorinda zvakanaka

Pa chipfuva chake:

Zvikuru ndinomuda

Jesu Kristu Ishe;

Ndiye Mufudzi wangu,

Ndiye muyamuri.

	130



Ndoda kuva sa Jesu

Wanga wakapfava,

Ndiye mwana mutsvene.

Wa Baba kudenga.

Ndoda kuva sa Jesu.

Ndoda kudzidzisa.

Ndigomukurumbidza,

Pamwe ne ngirosi.

title: UNADZO HWAI DZAKO ISHE
hymn:
Unadzo hwai dzako Ishe,

Dzinofudzwa newe,

Ne hwayana dzako Jesu,

Uri m’tungamiri.



Dzinorinzwa izwi rako,

Idzo hwai dzako.

Dzinokutevera Jesu,

Dziri shure kwako.



Izwi romufudzi mumwe,

Hadzirizive ‘ro,

Hadzibvumi kumtevera,

Dzinomramba iye.



Dzachengetwa newe Jesu

Idzo hwai dzako,

Hakungabiwe ne imwe

Pane chanja chako.

title: MUMWE ARIKO PAMSORO
hymn:
Mumwe ariko pamsoro:

Anotida!

Rudo rwake rwakakomba:

Anotida!

Hama dzedu dzinotiza,

Zvimwe dzinotitambudza;

Haano kutinyengedza:

Anotida!



Kumuziva ndohupenyu:

Anotida!

Wakatipa zvinhu zvose:

Anotida!

Tanga tiri kure naye,

Wakatitenga neropa;

Wakatiisa pa denga.

Anotida!



Jesu ndishamwari wedu:

Anotida!

Anoda kutifarisa:

Anotida!

Mwoyo yedu inomuda,

Yoda kushovedzwa naye;

Zvirokwazvo ne chokwadi:

Anotida!

	 

Toregerwa zvakaipa:

Anotida!

Togokunda hondo dzedu:

Anotida!

Anotipa zvipo zvose,

Anoda kutinakira;

Achatipa no hutsvene:

Anotida!

title: WATI IWE BABA WEDU
hymn:
Wati iwe Baba wedu

Kuvasika kwako vanhu,

Wasika vari vaviri

Murume no musikana.



Wariburitsa iro izwi

Rimire na nhasi uno;

Munhu ngaachisiya baba

Agare no m’kadzi wake.



Na ivava vatsva vedu,

Murume no musikana,

Vauya kusvitswa pano

Seyo tsika ye’zwi rako.



Vaitire vave chinhu

No kubvuma no kuita;

Vati kugara kwavo

Vayamurane nokuda.

	

Vape simba rinokwana,

Vaibate nzira yako,

Na makore avo ose,

Vachengete mirau Baba.

title: IMBA YAKANAKA, PA PAUNODIWA
hymn:
Imba yakanaka, pa paunodiwa,

Shamwari wedu, no Mponisi,

Iwe uri pamsoro pavo pose

Vanouya kuzoishanyira.



Imba yakanaka inavaviri

No mwoyo mumwechengete norudo;

Havana kutsaukaniswa no kufa,

Vagere vamwe kusingapere..



Imba yakanaka inavaduku,

Vakapihwa iwe pahucheche;

Iwe shamwari wavo wo kudenga

Vachengetwa newe sa amai.



Imba yakanaka pa vanokuda,

Vanonamata ne basa rose,

Ose mabasa anenge matsvene,

Anoitirwa iwe Ishe.



Imba yakanaka pa vanhu vose

Vanorega kukanganwa iwe;

Vazere rudo rwunofashaira

Anokuda vose vanodana.

	

Imba yakanaka pa vanorwara

Vanouyiswa kuna iwe,

N’anga yakanakisa Munyaradzi,

Unoporesa zvirwere zvose.



Pa musi uyo basa rikapera

Vachasangana newe kudenga.

Wakabva uko, ndopa wakaenda

Kumusha kwako usingapere.

title: RUDO RWKANAKA, RWAKUNDA ZVITUNGO
hymn:
Rudo rwkanaka, rwakunda zvitungo,

Topfugama pa chigaro chako,

Tichikumbirira ivo vaviri,

Vave norudo rwusingapere.



Hupenyu hwakwana vasimbisise.

Vape rutendo, mwoyo muchena,

Chifungidziro no kuvimbirira,

Noko kutenda kusingakundwe.



Vape rufaro pane nhamo dzose,

Vape ruregero nguva dzose,

Ngavatarire musi unouya

Watino kwaniswa rudo rwose.

title: MUKA MWEYA WANGU, FAMBA
hymn:
Muka mweya wangu, famba,

Enda kunoita basa;

Rasa nongo dzako, muka,

Inguva yokuteura.

	 

Mazuva akapfuura

Nungo dzako dzakanyanya;

Simuka nhasi chenjera

Kana Mwari achiuya.



Taura mazwi akanaka,

Uve nomwoyo chena,

Mwari ano wona zvose

Zvifungo ne znira dzako.



Muka zvimutsire mwoyo,

Imba pamwe nengirosi,

Dzinoramba dzchiimba,

Dzinokurumbidza Mwari.



Rukurumbidzo ngaruve

Kwauri Ishe kudenga;

Wandichengeta husiku

Wandipamhidzira simba.



Ndauya zve kuzopika,

Tive nechitenderano,

Tanda zvakaipa zvangu,

Ndizadze no Mweya wako.



Tungamira musi uno,

Mabasa a ndinoita:

Ne zvifungo na matama,

Ndikunamate na zvose.

	 

Imi mose pane nyika,

Nemiwo muri kudenga,

Kurumbidzai Mwari wenyu,

Mwanakomana no Mweya.

title: ZUVA RABUDA KAKARE
hymn:
Zuva rabuda kakare,

Tinonamata zve,

Kuti kupenya kwa Mwari

Kutitungamirire.



Tirege kuva ne mhosva

Dzinomutadzira;

Titaure chokwadi chete,

Tizere norudo.



Tiyamure Mwari wedu,

Musi wose uno;

Pa kunyengedza kwa Satan,

Kunotikombera.



Tinoda kukudza iwe,

Na mabasa ose;

Ropafadza ishe Mwari

Mwoyo yedu yose.



Ngatizvichengete Mwari,

Tirege kukundwa

No kukanuka kwe mwoyo

Kwakaipa kwazvo.

	 

Ngakuve ruropafadzo

Kuna Mwari Baba;

No kuno Mwanakomana;

No Mweya Mutsvene;



Ruchiva kuvanhu vose

Vari pano pasi,

Ruchibva no kungirosi

Dziriko kudenga.

title: MANGWANANI ZVINHU ZVOSE
hymn:
Mangwanani zvinhu zvose,

Zvinotenda Ishe iwe;

Iwe uno’penyu hose

Nesu takachengwa newe.



Iri zuva rinobuda

Richifamba nzira yaro;

Iri rinotirevera

Rinoti uri’She waro.



Noyu musi wakauya

Wava nokuyedza kwawo;

Uyu nawo unoreva,

Unzi, uri Muiti wawo.



Na matenga akakomba,

Amire ne minamato,

Ayawo anodzidzisa

Achiti, uri Muchengi

	 

Zvose zvinhu zvatarira,

Iwe kose kudya kwazvo;

Zvenge zvinokukumbira

Kwauri Musiki wazvo.



Tinogoti Baba wedu,

Tikutende, tikukudze;

Iwe M’sununguri wedu,

Na iwe Mweya Mutsvene.

title: ISHE INZWA MAZWI ANGU
hymn:
Ishe inzwa mazwi angu,

Uchiateerera;

Huna nokufunga kwangu,

Ukuzivisise.



Ndinokurumbidza iwe,

Ishe, Mwari wangu;

Rinonwzika mangwanani,

Newe izwi rangu.



Kose ikoko kutadza,

Kunovengwa newe;

Vose vanoda kutadza,

Vonotandwa newe.



Ngindipinnde ini Ishe,

Kune imba yako;

Ndisangane newe uko,

Noko kuda kwako.

	

Ivo vanoimba newe,

Ngava fare vose;

Vashevedze nokufara,

Pane nguva dzose.

title: NDINOKURUMBIDZA IWE
hymn:
Ndinokurumbidza iwe,

Mwari mukuru Mauro ano,

Ndivumbamire se huku,

Nawo mapapiro ako.



Ndiregerere, Jehova,

Ne nzira ya Jesu Kristu,

Zvose zvakaipa zvangu,

Zvandaita musi uno.



Ndidzidzise iwe Mwari,

Ndigere pano panyika,

Ndisingatye kufa uku

Kunouya mumwe musi.



Mweya wangu ngaugare,

Uve newe pane rima,

Ngandirinde zvakanaka

Kuti ndimuke nesimba.



Kana ndichishaya hope,

Ndipe zvifungo zvitsvene;

Zvibve kwandiri zviroto

Zvakaipa zv husiku.

	

Ndinozviisa pauri,

Ndichengete Mwari wangu;

Kana kuchiuya kufa

Ndipe imba yakanaka.



Ndinoda kuzvirongedza,

Ndigare nomwenje wangu,

Nomwenje wakabatidzwa,

Ndimirire Ishe wangu.



Imi mose vapanyika,

Nemiwo muri kudenga,

Kurumbidzai Mwari wenyu,

Mwanakomana no Mweya.

title: ISHE IWE WAKANDICHENGETA
hymn:
Ishe, iwe wakandichengeta

Masikati zvandakaremerwa,

Uve neni kakare husiku

Gara neni zuva radooka.

	

Kana mwoyo wangu uchichema,

Izwi rako rinondifarisa;

Ndipe izwi roruropafadzo,

Ruropafadzo rwo rwok unyaradza.



Kana wandisiya ndirindoga,

Ndava nomwoyo mutema Ishe;

Kana iwe uri pa’mba yangu,

Ndinenge ndadya kudya kutsvene.

	 

Kana uchinditara maurano,

Ndaropafadzwa jehova Ishe;

Kana ndinewe zuva ravaira,

Handidi chimwe chokukwanisa.



Huya Ishe kuzogara neni,

Shure kwe basa re masikati;

Huya undipe rufaro rwako,

No ruponiso ne mabumudzo.



Sunga maronda, rapa zvirwere

Zvauya kwa ndiri musi uno;

Kuti ndirege kugungudzika,

Ndizorore pane mwoyo wako.

title: ZUVA RADOKA MWARI
hymn:
Zuva radoka Mwari;

Tinotenda iwe;

Tichengete usiku

Tisingakutadze:

Jesu tatrire iwe,

Tirindire pa husiku.



Rufaro rwakapera;

Tinokukumbira,

Kuti panohusiku

Tirege kutadza;

O, Jesu, tivenekere,

Tirindire pa husiku.

	 

Mabasa akapera;

Tinokuimbira;

Tichengete pangozi,

Pa rima rauya:

Jesu titarire iwe,

Tirindire pahusiku.



Ponesa mwoyo yedu.

Iwe unoziva

Ingozi dziri zhinji

Dzinotigarira:

Inzwa kushovedza kwedu,

Tichengete pane zvose.

title: MUMWE MUSI AVA MAURO
hymn:
Mumwe musi ava Mauro,

Varwere vakaungana.

Panyasi pa Jesu Ishe,

Vakaenda no rufaro.

	

Na nhasi isu tauya,

Tosedeara ne zvirwere;

Mumhu wako hatiuwone,

Toziva kuti uromo.



Tanda dambudziko redu;

Vamwe vairwara kwazvo;

Vamwe havati vakuda;

Vamwe vakarasa rudo.

	

Vamwe vakaneta pano;

Vakashaya ruyamuro,

Vamwe vane hama dzavo

Dzinovatambudza kwazvo.



Vose vanoda rufaro,

Vanoda noruregero,

Na vatendi vanoziva

Mwoyo yavo yakaipa.



Kristu iwe uri munhu,

Wanga wayedzwa zvikuru;

Meso ako anoona

Zva tinotsvaka kuvanza.



Simba rako richigere;

Unogona kuponesa;

Tinzwire tsitsi maurano,

Tiponese Mwari tose.

title: NGONI DZAKRISTU MUPONISI
hymn:
Mwari Baba, uve nesu,

Utichengete maurano,

Uve nesu vana vako,

Parima tivenekere.

	

Muponisi tiregere

Zvose zvakaipa zvedu;

Tisunungure maurano,

Parima tivenekere.

	

Mweya huya uve nesu,

Tive vatsvene maurano,

Mwoyo yedu musha wako,

Parima tivenekere.



Mwari vatatu no mumwe,

Chishamiso chakudenga,

Tidzidzise zvinhu zvose,

Parima tivenekere.

title: MUPONISI TINOKURUMBIDZA
GARAI NENI IZUVA RADOKA
ENDA NESU KUDZIMBA
NGONI
hymn:
Ngoni dza Kritsu Mponisi,

Rudo rwa Mwari Baba wedu,

No kuwadzana ko Mweya,

Kuve nesu kwe denga !

Ezvo tose togarana,

Mumwe nomumwe,Ishe;

Mwoyo yedu inofara,

Ne nguva dzose dzedu.Amen.

title: TIRI PAHUPENYU
hymn:
Tawonana nhasi,

Ngaakurumbidzwe Jesu,

Wakatipa tsitsi.



Wakatichengeta,

Wakatiponesa,

Ngatikurumbidze Jesu,

Tiri mberi kwake.



Tanga tatambura,

Tanga taremerwa,

Tanga tizere nokutya,

Tanga takabatwa.



Asi Jesu Ishe,

Wakatiponesa,

Rudo rwake rwakanyanya,

Rwakatichengeta.

	

Ngatikudze isu.

Simba rake guru,

Rinotiponesa kwazvo,

Tirege kutadza.



Zvino ngatiyedze 

Basa rakanaka,

Tirase zvose zvenyika,

Timuwane jesu.

title: KUDZA JEHOVAH MUKURU
hymn:
Tinoirima minda,

Tinodyara mbeu,

Asi dzinokuririswa

Ne simba ra Mwari;

Anozvituma zvose

Zvo kuchenga mbeu,

Imhepo nero zuva,

Mvura yakanaka



KORUS

    Zvose zva tinazvo

    Zvinobva ku Mwari;

    Tenda kuna Ishe wedu

    Titendere rudo.



Ndine musiki bedzi

Wezvo zvinhu zvose

Anoshongedza nyika,

Na maruva ose.

	

Mhepo inomuteerera,

Anodyisa shiri,

Zvikuru nokwatiri

Anotipa kudya



Tinotendera zvose

Zvinotinakira;

Kudyara nokucheka

No hupenyu hwedu.

Gamchira zvatapira,

Tora ya unoda

Mwoyo yedu-yose

title: KUDZA JEHOVAH MUKURU
hymn:
Tinoirima minda,

Tinodyara mbeu,

Asi dzinokuririswa

Ne simba ra Mwari;

Anozvituma zvose

Zvo kuchenga mbeu,

Imhepo nero zuva,

Mvura yakanaka



KORUS

    Zvose zva tinazvo

    Zvinobva ku Mwari;

    Tenda kuna Ishe wedu

    Titendere rudo.



Ndine musiki bedzi

Wezvo zvinhu zvose

Anoshongedza nyika,

Na maruva ose.

	

Mhepo inomuteerera,

Anodyisa shiri,

Zvikuru nokwatiri

Anotipa kudya



Tinotendera zvose

Zvinotinakira;

Kudyara nokucheka

No hupenyu hwedu.

Gamchira zvatapira,

Tora ya unoda

Mwoyo yedu-yose

title: HUYAI VANHU TIIMBE
hymn:
Huyai,vanhu,tiimbe

Rwiyo rwedu rwe zhizha:

Zviyo zvose zvachekwa,

Taka kohwa paminda:

Jehova Wakatipa

Zvose zvatinoshaya;

Huyai ku’mba yake,

Ngatimukurumbidze.



Tiri munda wa Mwari,

Anotsvaka kwatiri

Kudya kwakarurama

Kubve pa mwoyo yedu;

Mapumuri ne hura,

Shure kwezvo zvaibva,

Ishe Tinoda kuva

Zviyo zvakanakisa.



Nokuti Mwari wedu

Achauya kucheka,

Achapisa no moto

Hundi yose yo munda;

Achatuma kumunda

Nhume dzake dzedenga

Dzichaisa zvo kudya

Mune zvitura zvake.



Zvino vose vatendi

Vachaimba zvikuru:

Vachiti taponiswa,

Tabva pazvakaipa;

Tatsveneswa na Jesu,

Tinogara na Mwari,

Imbai imi ngirozi,

Imbai rwiyo rwe zhizha.

Imbai rwiyo rwe zhizha.

title: BABA NDIWE WOGA
hymn:
Muyamuri wedu,

Inzwa mikumbiro 

Yavanyai vako.	

Vachengete Mwari,Ishe,

Vafambe pa nzvimbo dzose.

	

Iwe Mwari,baba,

Pane nzvimbo dzose

Tipe nzeve dzako

Inzwa muteuro.

Unamaropafadzo-ose,

A unoda kutip’isu.



Uvakomborere,

Nedzo nzira dzabo,

No kupenya kwako

Ngakuve kwavari;

Vazere norudo rwako

Vaitise kuda kwako.



Varinde pa ngozi,

Na pazvinoruma,

Simba rako Mwari

Risinokukundwa.

Zva tiri kure kunavo,

Tova kumbirira iwe.



Nesuwo vafambi

Pa nzira dze nyika,

Tinochingurana

Tinogotsaukana,

Tose tiri mukuenda,

Ku musha wedu kudenga.

title: ISHE BABA TITARIRE
hymn:
Muponise mambo;

Ave namazuva;

Muponise!

Kunda hondo dzake,

Ave norufaro:

Atibate nguva:

Muponise!



Mupe zvipo zvako

Zvakanaka zvose;

Muponise!

Achengete mirau,

Ave namakore,

Atifarisise:

Muponise.

title: ISHE BABA TITARIRE
hymn:
Muponise mambo;

Ave namazuva;

Muponise!

Kunda hondo dzake,

Ave norufaro:

Atibate nguva:

Muponise!



Mupe zvipo zvako

Zvakanaka zvose;

Muponise!

Achengete mirau,

Ave namakore,

Atifarisise:

Muponise.

title: MAPUTE ANOPFUURA
hymn:
Mapute apfuura ako
