Pamsoro pamakomo

Pa rwizi no tukova,

Chirevo cha Ishe wedu

Tinochirangarira,

Tichazivana zvikuru

Mapute apfuura.

	

KORUS

     Isu tozozviziva,

     Hatichazova toga,

     Pa kuyedza kwa mangwana,

     Zuva rakanakisa

     Tichazivana zvikuru.



Tinotsika pa nzira

No mwoyo yaremerwa,

Tinogara mumimvuri

Ohinhambgwe panomumwe;

Asi rudo rwo ‘Mponisi

Rwunodzorera basa,

Kana tosangana uko

Mapute apfuura.



Tichauya no rufaro,

Tinozokomba Jesu,

Pedyo pavo vanotida

Tichazivana ’esu.

No rwiyo rwo ruponiso

Ri charira narinhi

Kana yopera mimvuri

Mapute apfuura.

title: SIMUKIRAI JESU
hymn:
Simukirai Jesu

Hondo dzake imi.

Simudza muchinjikwa

Urege ‘paradzwa.



Kukunda noku kukunda

Tinotungamirwa,

Kubisa zvakaipa

Pane nyika yose.



Korus

Mu mukirei

Hondo dzake imi

Simudza muchinjikwa

Urege

Urege’paradzwa.



Simukirai Jesu

Anotidaidza,

Kuenda kunorwisa

Zvinhu zvakaipa,

Ngatimunamateyi,

Varipo vavengi,

Tirwise nesimba

Ngatiseke ngozi.



Simukirai Jesu

Simba rake rose,

Maoko enyama

Anozo tadzisa

Shongedzai na Kristu

Tarisisai kwazvo,

Pa nhamo zvimwe ngozi

Tichaita basa.



Simukirai Jesu

Kurwisa kopera,

Nhasi bishe rwehondo

Mangwana toimba,

Kana tinozokunda

Towana ngundu,

Nokugara namambo

Nokusingapere.

title: NDIYANI PANEZAMBA
hymn:
Ndiyani pane zamba

Vafudzi vopfugama?



Korus

Ndiye Jesu zvoshamisa,

Ndiye Mambo wo kudenga,

Topfugama kwaari,

Mutunidzi, ndi Mwari.



Ndiyani anenzara

Pa sango ari oga?



Ndiyani akapfava

Ne dama rakanaka?



Ndiyani anorapa

Vose vanorwadziwa?



Ndiyani anochema

“Razaro buda guva”?



Ndiyani vokwazisa

Nedzimbo ne kufara?



Ndiyani ateura

Pa husiku mumunda?



Ndiyani atifira

Pamsoro muchinjikwa?



Ndiyani anomuka

Isu kutinunura?



Ndiyani po kudenga

Anotonga nesimba?

title: BABA ZVINO TINOKUDZA
hymn:
Baba zvino tinokudza

Imi nehumambo hwenyu,

Muri Dombo re Makore,

Munogara nekugara;

Ruponiso rwenyu Baba,

Runogara rwakadaro,

Vanhu venyu vose Baba,

Vanogara nemasimba.

	 

Honai ruponiso rwenyu,

Runopararira kwose,

Rwunezvose zvakanaka

Ruvimbiso rwohupenyu;

Hatichazotambudzika,

Hatichazoshayi chinhu,

Tina Baba vakanaka,

Muchengeti Mumiriri.



Tinokomborerwa naye

Masikati nehusiku,

Nguva dzose ari padyo

Kuratidza nzira yedi;

Nhasi, tinomukumbira

Mazwi ake akanaka,

Tinokurumbidza iye

Uyo ane simba rose.

title: BABA MURI RUDO
hymn:
Baba muri rudo, munotida tese,

Imi makaruramisa kune vanhu vese:

Mmunotipa zuva nekutonhorera,

Nehusiku hunowuya kuti tizorore.



Munotichingeta kana takarara,

Muchinyatsa kutimutsa mangwani esr

Nedzi pfuma dzedu tinopihwa nemi,

Hatingadziwani kwete kunze kwenyu imi.

	

Makatipa Jesu mwana wenyu mumwe,

Kuti atisumumgure pakusungwa kwedu:

Baba, rudo rwenyu ruri kwese kwese,

Muri muchengeti wedu munogutsa tose.

title: NDITUNGAMIRIRE BABA
hymn:
Tune: Lead me Saviour

Nditungamirire Baba,

Nditungamirire kwazvo,

Ndinofara ndiri wenyu,

Ndinokudai nguva dzose.

	

Korus

Baba, Baba

Nditungamirirei nhasi,

Kuti ndisasiye nzira

Nditungamirirei Baba.



Muri bako rakanaka

Mumatambudziko ese,

Ndacgengetwa ndiri wenyu,

Ndovimba nerudo rwenyu.



Ishe nditungamireyi,

Misi yose yohupenyu,

Kune nyika yekudenga,

Kune musha wakanaka.

title: NDIRI MUNHU WENYU, JESU
hymn:
Tune: Lead me Saviour

Nditungamirire Baba,

Nditungamirire kwazvo,

Ndinofara ndiri wenyu,

Ndinokudai nguva dzose.

	

Korus

Baba, Baba

Nditungamirirei nhasi,

Kuti ndisasiye nzira

Nditungamirirei Baba.



Muri bako rakanaka

Mumatambudziko ese,

Ndacgengetwa ndiri wenyu,

Ndovimba nerudo rwenyu.



Ishe nditungamireyi,

Misi yose yohupenyu,

Kune nyika yekudenga,

Kune musha wakanaka.

title: ITAI M’PONISI SEZVAMUNODA
hymn:
Tune: have thine own way, Lord,


Itai, M’ponisi sezvamunoda,

Muri muumbi, ‘ni ndirivu,

Ndiumbei Ishe, sezvamunoda,

Ndakamirira, ndakatsungi’ra.

	 

Itai, M’ponisi sezvamunoda,

Nditarisei nekundiyedza;

Suka mu moyo, kuti ndichene,

Ndigozofanira kudenga.



Itai, M’ponisi sezvamunoda,

Ndakakuvadzwa, ngandirapwe,

Simba nderenyu, kuda ndekwenyu,

Ngandisimbiswe, Mwana wa Mwari.



Itai, M’ponisi sezvamunoda,

Pisai kuipa, isai kunaka;

Nditungamirei zvakarurama,

Nditambirei, Ishe ndapota.



Itai, M’ponisi sezvamunoda,

Ndidzidzisei zvose zva Baba;

Ndigadzirirei Imba kumsoro,

Ndoda kugara nemi, M’ponisi.

title: UNGATORE HAKO NYIKA
hymn:
Tune: Give Me Jesus.


Ungatore hako nyika

Nerufaro rwayo rwose,

Ndinotora hangu Jesu

Nerufaro rwake rwose.

		

Korus

Tsitsi dzake zhinji zhinji

Dzinokwana kune vose,

Ruponiso rwakakomba,

Runofadza iwe neni.





Ungatore hako Nyika

Nehupfumi hwayo hwose,

Ndinofadzwe naye Jesu,

Haazondinyimi chinhu.



Ungatore hako nyika 

Nemichero inorwadza,

Asi ini ndine nhaka

Yehupenyu kuna Mwari.



Ungatore hako nyika 

Asi unofamba woga,

Ini ndine Muponisi,

Iye Mambo wava mambo.



Ungatore hako nyika 

Asi haigutsi Mweya

Ini ndinotora Jeu,

Uyo une zvinhu zvose.



Ungatore hako nyika 

Uchitadza uchichema

Asi ini ndinofara,

Ndine mubatsiri wangu.

title: NDINE HAMA YAKANAKA
hymn:
Tune: A Blessed Refuge.


Ndine hama yakanaka.

Iyo ine simba rose,

Inondida zvirokwazvo,

Inondipa simba rayo.



Korus

Ndine hama yakanaka,

Ine simba kuchengeta,

Inesimba kuponesa,

Ndinofara kuva nayo.



Ndina Baba vakanaka,

Vanondida nguva dzose,

Vanondipa zvinhu zvose

Zvakanaka zvipenyu.



Ndina muponisis wangu,

Anogara ko kudenga,

Anondidudzira zvose

Zvakanaka zvehupenyu.



Ndine Buku rakanaka,

Rakanyorwa kare kare,

Rine mazwi ehupenyu,

Rinondipa zano rose.



Mwari wakasunungura

Zvakaipa zvangu zvose,

Zvino ndine runyararo

Nerufaro nerutendo.

title: URI KUTAMBUDZIKIREYIKO?
hymn:
Tune: Tell it to Jesus.


Uri kutambudzikireyiko?

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Muponisi anokuponesa,

Zviudze Jesu nhasi.



Korus

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu;

Ndiye shamwari ne hama,

Hakuchina mumwe wakadaro,

Zviudze Jesu nhasi.



Misodzi ndeyiko, hama?

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Munyaradzi, anokunyaradza,

Zviudze Jesu, pachako.



Uri kutya dambudziko here?

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Uri kutya re mangwana here?

Zviudze Jesu nhasi.



Uri kutya rufu here, iwe?

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Uyo wakakunda rufu rwake,

Anozokupa kukunda.



Unoshaya anotungamira,

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Mweya M’tsvene ndi Mutungamairi,

Zviudze Jesu nhasi.

title: MAZWI AKANAKISA
hymn:
Tune: Wonderful words.


Mazwi akanakisa imbaizve kwandiri,

Ngandiwone kunaka, mazwi e ruponiso,

Mazwi akanaka anotipa zano,

Akanakisa, anoshamisa, mazwi e ruponiso.



Anopihwa na Kristu, mazwi e ruponiso,

Inzwai, mese vatadzi, mazwi e ruponiso,

Mazwi e hupwnyu anpihwa imi,

Akanakisa, anoshamisa, mazwi e ruponiso.



Inzwai, imim masoko, mazwi e ruponiso,

Anokupai rufaro, mazwi e ruponiso,

Munosunungurwa, kana muchitenda,

Akanakisa, anoshamisa, mazwi e ruponiso.

title: NDI JEHOVA WAVA MUTEMBERI YAKE
hymn:
Ndi Jehova wava Mutemberi yake,

Wava Mutemberi yake yakachena.

Nyika yose (Bass)

Nyika yose (All)

Inyarare (Bass)

Inyarare mberi kwake (All)

Nyika yose inyarare mberi kwake.

Inyarare mberi kwake.

Mwari Baba, Tagarira Shoko rako,

Tamirira tinyerere mberi kwako.

title: HUYAI MESE MUNENYOTA
hymn:
Tune: Luton


Huyai mese mune nyota,

Mu mwoyo yenyu mururame,

Mwari anopa zvinhu zvose,

Torai zvino ruponeso.



Vatendi, murikudaidzwa,

Huyai kuna Baba venyu.

Mupiwe mvura yehupenyu,

Murege kuzotadza zve.



Huyai makasununguka,

Mutore henyu hamutengi,

Torai nhasi ruponiso,

Musatye, anokudai mese.



Huyai tizogara nhaka,

Ya Baba vedu ve kudenga,

Baba wa vese ane zvese,

Zve kugovera vanomuda.



Jehova wedu wakanaka,

Hakuna mumwe wakadaro,

Ngatimunde, timukudze,

Nekuti tinotongwa naye.

title: USIKU HWE UTSVENE
hymn:
Pa usiku hwe utsvene,

Kuna nyika iri kure,

Yakapenya nyenyedzi ya She,

Chiwoneso cha Mwari we dii,

Uko Ishe wazvarwa,

Uko kwazvarwa Mesiya.



Baba vake vakashuma,

Mai vake vakafara,

Mwana wavo M’ponisi we vanhu,

Wakakudzwa zvikuru na Mwari,

Pasi pese chifarai,

Mwari wazotishanyira.



Mene danga radzo n’gombe,

Wakazvarwa mwana mutsva,

Ndiye rudo rwa Baba kunesu,

Ndiye mwana waMwari muepnu,

Ndiye mudi we vanhu,

Ne mudikani we vese.

title: NHASI NGATIMUTONDERE
hymn:
Tune: why not Now


Nhasi ngatirangarire,

Uyo wakafira vese,

Ari kudaidza vese,

Anovada zviro kwazvo.

	

Korus

Uyai zvino uyai zvino,

Uyai zvino kuna Jesu,

Musamire, uyai zvino,

Nguva yakanaka zvino.



Zvimwe makafamba kure,

Kubva nzira yakanaka,

Jesu anosunungura,

Kan muchitendeuka.



Jesu anodisa avo,

Vanochema ne zvitadzo,

Anovapa mwoyo mutsva,

Kuti vave vana vake.



Tambirai chipo chake,

Munopihwa ruponiso,

Tambira runyararo,

Ne rufaro rwakanaka.

title: WAGADZIRA NHASI HERE?
hymn:
Tune: have you Any Room for Jesus


Wagadzira nhasi here,

Nzvimbo yake Muponisi,

Ye kugara mweya wake?

Wakakumirira zvino.

	

Korus

Hongu, ndine zvimbo yake,

Ishe wa Madzishe ose,

Mwoyo wangu ndazarura,

Kugam’chira Jesu Kristi.



Mwari wakatisikira,

Kuva imba ye kugara,

Anotuma Mweya ‘Mtsvene,

Kuti azogara nesu.



Une nzvimbo yake here,

Uyo wakakununura?

Apo wanga wakaraswa,

Wakauya kukutsvaka.



Haunacho chipo, here?

Chaungape Ishe wako?

Asi anofadzwa kwazvo,

Kugam’chira mwoyo wako.



Kana uchimukanganwa,

Ungazoponeswa sei,

Zvo kusina rimwe zita,

Ra ungaponeswe naro.

title: NDANZWA ISHE WANDIDANA
hymn:
Tune: where He Leads me


Ndanzwa Ishe wandidana,

(Imbayi katatu)

Ndochimutevera misi yese.



Ndinomupa mwoyo wangu,

Ndochimutevera misi yese.



Ndinoita kuda kwake,

Ndochimutevera misi yese.



Ndinodzidza nzira yake,

Ndochimutevera misi yese.



Ndinodisa izwi rake,

Ndochimutevera misi yese.



Ndinosuwa izwi rake,

Ndochimutevera misi yese.



Ndinomushandira zvangu,

Ndochimutevera misi yese.



Ndinodisa Chechi Tsvene,

Ndochimutevera misi yese.



Ndinogara na M’ponisi,

Ndochimutevera misi yese.



Ndokudza Jesu Kristu,

Ndochimutevera misi yese.

title: MWARI BABA VANGU
hymn:
Tune: wauya wauya


Mwari, Baba vangu, ndinowona vanhu

Vakasiya nzira yenyu, vava varasiki,

Garai neni, garai neni,

Nekusingaperi.



Nehupenyu hwangu huduku zvikuru

Asi ndinotenda kuti munogara neni,

Garai neni, garai neni,

Nekusingaperi.



Pasi pano pose, ndinowona kuti

Zvinhu zvose zvichapera, imi munogara

Garai neni, garai neni,

Nekusingaperi.



Vanhu vanozvarwa, ivo vagokura,

Asi kufa kuchauya, Baba Garai neni;

Garai neni, garai neni,

Nekusingaperi.



Kana ndichichema ne matambudziko,

Achapera ndichafara, Baba garai neni,

Garai neni, garai neni,

Nekusingaperi.
